 3300: 	IAI16_AI_Channel_Multiple_Get( 	board_id,
 3301: 									0,
 3302: 									IAI16_CHANNEL_QTY - 1,
 3303: 									0,
 3304: 									table
 3305: 								 );
 3306: 
 3307: 	for ( channel = 0; channel < IAI16_CHANNEL_QTY; channel++ )
 3308: 	{
 3309: 		printf( "IA%02d:  0x%04X  %d\n", channel, table[channel], table[channel] );
 3310: 	}
 3311: 
 3312: 
 3313: 
 3314: 
 3315: 
 3316: 
 3317: 
 3318: 
 3319: 	return SUCCESS;
 3320: }
 3321: 
 3322: 
 3323: 
 3327: static struct command_line_board  cmd_iai16[] =
 3328: {
 3329: 		{	NULL,				CMD__IAI16_AI_ID,		"id",		"params: none.  Reports the AI board/component ID."		},
 3330: 		{	NULL,				CMD__IAI16_AI_Channel,	"chan",		"params: <channel>"										},
 3331: 		{	NULL,				CMD__IAI16_AI_All,	 	"all",		"gets all analog inputs"								},
 3332: 		{   cmd_ido48_test,		CMD__IAI16_Test,		"test",		"semi-auto test functions"								},
 3333: 	{	NULL,	NULL,				NULL,		NULL													},
 3334: };
 3335: 
 3341: int Command_Line_IAI16( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
 3342: { 
 3343: 	int 		error_code;
 3344: 	int 		index;
 3345:     int     	argc_new;
 3346:     char ** 	argv_new;
 3347:     char *      endptr;
 3348:     
 3349: 
 3350: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
 3351: 
 3352: 	if ( ID_IDO48 != board_id ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
 3353: 
 3354: 	error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
 3355: 
 3356: 	
 3357: 	strtol( argv[0], &endptr, 0 ); 
 3358: 	if ( argv[0] != endptr )
 3359: 	{  
 3360: 		error_code = (* cmd_iai16[0].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc, argv );
 3361: 	}
 3362: 	else
 3363: 	{ 
 3364: 		index = 0;
 3365: 		while ( NULL != cmd_iai16[index].cmd_fnc )
 3366: 		{
 3367: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_iai16[index].name, argv[0] )  )
 3368: 			{
 3369: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
 3370: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
 3371: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
 3372: 				error_code = (* cmd_iai16[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
 3373: 				break;
 3374: 			}
 3375: 			index++;
 3376: 		}
 3377: 	}
 3378: 	return error_code;
 3379: }
 3380: 
 3381: 
 3382: 
 3383: 
 3384: 
 3385: 
 3386: 
 3387: #endif
 3388: 
 3389: 
 3390: 
 3391: 
 3392: 
 3393: 
 3394: 
 3395: 
 3404: int IDI_DIN_ID_Get( int board_id, uint16_t * id )
 3405: {
 3406: 	uint8_t   	lsb, msb;
 3407: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
 3408: 
 3409: 	dataset = (struct board_dataset *) board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 3410: 
 3411: 	if ( MODE_JUMPERS_0 == dataset->mode_jumpers )
 3412: 	{ 
 3413: 		return -EC_MODE_LEGACY;
 3414: 	}
 3415: 
 3416: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_ID_LSB, &lsb );
 3417: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_ID_MSB, &msb );
 3418: 	*id = ( ((uint16_t) msb) << 8 ) | ((uint16_t) lsb);
 3419: 
 3420: 
 3421: #if defined( ID_ALWAYS_REPORT_AS_GOOD )
 3422: 	*id = ID_DIN;
 3423: #endif
 3424: 	return SUCCESS;
 3425: }
 3426: 
 3434: BOOL IDI_DIN_IsNotPresent( int board_id )
 3435: {
 3436: 	uint16_t id;
 3437: 	IDI_DIN_ID_Get( board_id, &id );
 3438: 	if (ID_DIN == id ) return 0;
 3439: 	return 1;
 3440: }
 3441: 
 3451: int IDI_DIN_Channel_Get( int board_id, size_t channel, BOOL * value )
 3452: {
 3453: 	size_t 	group;
 3454: 	size_t 	bit;
 3455: 	uint8_t reg_value;
 3456: 
 3457: 	group = channel >> IDI_DIN_SHIFT_RIGHT;
 3458: 	bit   = channel - group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
 3459: 
 3460: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_DI_GROUP0 + group , &reg_value );
 3461: 
 3462: 	if ( 0 != ( reg_value & ( 0x01 << bit ) ) ) *value = true;
 3463: 	else                                        *value = false;
 3464: 
 3465: 	return SUCCESS;
 3466: }
 3467: 
 3477: int IDI_DIN_Group_Get( int board_id, size_t group, uint8_t * value )
 3478: {
 3479: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_DI_GROUP0 + group , value );
 3480: 	return SUCCESS;
 3481: }
 3482: 
 3491: int IDI_DIN_Pending_Clear( int board_id, size_t channel )
 3492: {
 3493: 	size_t 	group;
 3494: 	size_t 	bit;
 3495: 	uint8_t reg_value;
 3496: 
 3497: 	group = channel >> IDI_DIN_SHIFT_RIGHT;
 3498: 	bit   = channel - group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
 3499: 
 3500: 	if ( group >= IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY ) return -EC_CHANNEL;
 3501: 
 3502: 	reg_value = (uint8_t)( 0x01 << bit );
 3503: 	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group , reg_value );
 3504: 	return SUCCESS;
 3505: }
 3506: 
 3507: 
 3508: 
 3509: 
 3510: 
 3511: 
 3512: 
 3514: 
 3516: 
 3517: 
 3526: static int SPI_ID_Get_Helper( int board_id, int id_lsb, int id_msb, uint16_t * id )
 3527: {
 3528: 	uint8_t   	lsb, msb;
 3529: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
 3530: 
 3531: 	dataset = (struct board_dataset *) board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 3532: 
 3533: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_ID_Get_Helper"
 3534: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3535: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3536: #endif
 3537: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3538: 
 3539: 	if ( MODE_JUMPERS_0 == dataset->mode_jumpers )
 3540: 	{ 
 3541: 		return -EC_MODE_LEGACY;
 3542: 	}
 3543: 
 3544: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, id_lsb, &lsb );
 3545: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, id_msb, &msb );
 3546: 	*id = ( ((uint16_t) msb) << 8 ) | ((uint16_t) lsb);
 3547: #if defined( ID_ALWAYS_REPORT_AS_GOOD )
 3548: 	*id = ID_SPI;
 3549: #endif
 3550: 	return SUCCESS;
 3551: }
 3552: 
 3553: int SPI_ID_Get( int board_id, uint16_t * id )
 3554: {
 3555: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_ID_Get"
 3556: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3557: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3558: #endif
 3559: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3560: 
 3561: 	switch ( board_id )
 3562: 	{
 3563: 		case ID_IDI48:
 3564: 			return SPI_ID_Get_Helper( board_id, IDI_SPI_ID_LSB, IDI_SPI_ID_MSB, id );
 3565: 		case ID_IDO48:
 3566: 			return SPI_ID_Get_Helper( board_id, IDO_SPI_ID_LSB, IDO_SPI_ID_MSB, id );
 3567: 	}
 3568: 	return -EC_BOARD;
 3569: }
 3570: 
 3579: int SPI_IsNotPresent( int board_id )
 3580: {
 3581: 	int 	 				error_code;
 3582: 	uint16_t 				id;
 3583: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
 3584: 	dataset = (struct board_dataset *) board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 3585: 
 3586: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_IsNotPresent"
 3587: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3588: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3589: #endif
 3590: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3591: 
 3592: 	
 3595: 	if ( true == dataset->spi_is_present ) return 0;
 3596: 
 3597: 	error_code = SPI_ID_Get( board_id, &id );
 3598: 	if ( error_code < 0 ) return error_code;
 3599: 	if (ID_SPI == id )
 3600: 	{
 3601: 		dataset->spi_is_present	= true;
 3602: 		return 0;
 3603: 	}
 3604: 	return 1;
 3605: }
 3606: 
 3621: int SPI_Calculate_Half_Clock( double     half_clock_request_sec, 
 3622: 							  double *   half_clock_actual_sec,  
 3623: 							  double *   error,                  
 3624: 							  uint16_t * hci                     
 3625: 							)
 3626: {
 3627: 	double    	scratch;
 3628: 	int			hci_temp;
 3629: 
 3630: 	
 3631: 	scratch = ( half_clock_request_sec / CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC ) - 4.0;
 3632: 	hci_temp = (int) scratch;
 3633: 
 3634: 	if ( ( hci_temp > 4095 ) || ( hci_temp < 0 ) ) return -EC_SPI_HALF_CLOCK_OUT_OF_RANGE;
 3635: 
 3636: 	
 3637: 	scratch = CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC * ( 4.0 + ((double) hci_temp) );
 3638: 	if ( NULL != error                 ) *error                 = ( scratch - half_clock_request_sec ) / half_clock_request_sec;
 3639: 	if ( NULL != half_clock_actual_sec ) *half_clock_actual_sec = scratch;
 3640: 	if ( NULL != hci                   ) *hci                   = (uint16_t) hci_temp;
 3641: 	return SUCCESS;
 3642: }
 3643: 
 3658: int SPI_Calculate_Clock( double     clock_request_hz, 	
 3659: 						 double *   clock_actual_hz,	
 3660: 						 double *   error,       		
 3661: 						 uint16_t * hci          		
 3662: 						)
 3663: {
 3664: 	int 	 error_code;
 3665: 	double 	 half_clock_request_sec;
 3666: 	double	 half_clock_actual_sec;
 3667: 	double   error_internal;
 3668: 	double	 scratch;
 3669: 	uint16_t hci_internal;
 3670: 
 3671: 	half_clock_request_sec = 1.0 / ( 2.0 * clock_request_hz );
 3672: 
 3673: 	error_code = SPI_Calculate_Half_Clock( half_clock_request_sec,
 3674: 										   &half_clock_actual_sec,
 3675: 										   &error_internal,
 3676: 										   &hci_internal
 3677: 										  );
 3678: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
 3679: 
 3680: 	
 3681: 	scratch = 1.0 / ( 2.0 * half_clock_actual_sec );
 3682: 	if ( NULL != error           ) *error           = ( scratch - clock_request_hz ) / clock_request_hz;
 3683: 	if ( NULL != clock_actual_hz ) *clock_actual_hz = scratch;
 3684: 	if ( NULL != hci             ) *hci             = (uint16_t) hci_internal;
 3685: 	return SUCCESS;
 3686: }
 3687: 
 3695: double SPI_Calculate_Half_Clock_Interval_Sec( uint16_t half_clock_interval  )
 3696: {
 3697: 	double half_clock_interval_sec;
 3698: 	half_clock_interval_sec = CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC * ( 4.0 + ((double) half_clock_interval ) );
 3699: 	return half_clock_interval_sec;
 3700: }
 3701: 
 3715: int SPI_Calculate_End_Cycle_Delay( double    spi_half_clock_interval_sec, 
 3716: 							       double    delay_request_sec,           
 3717: 							       double *  delay_actual_sec,            
 3718: 							       double *  error,                       
 3719: 							       uint8_t * ecd                          
 3720: 								)
 3721: {
 3722: 	
 3723: 	double    	scratch;
 3724: 	int			ecd_temp;
 3725: 
 3726: 	
 3727: 	scratch = ( delay_request_sec - 4.0 * CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC ) / spi_half_clock_interval_sec;
 3728: 	ecd_temp = (int) scratch;
 3729: 
 3730: 	if ( ( ecd_temp > 255 ) || ( ecd_temp < 0 ) ) return -EC_SPI_ECD_OUT_OF_RANGE;
 3731: 
 3732: 	
 3733: 	scratch = CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC * 4.0 + ((double) ecd_temp) * spi_half_clock_interval_sec;
 3734: 	if ( NULL != error            ) *error            = ( scratch - delay_request_sec ) / delay_request_sec;
 3735: 	if ( NULL != delay_actual_sec ) *delay_actual_sec = scratch;
 3736: 	if ( NULL != ecd              ) *ecd              = (uint8_t) ecd_temp;
 3737: 	return SUCCESS;
 3738: }
 3739: 
 3748: int SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Get( int board_id, SPI_CSB_ENUM * chip_select_behavior )
 3749: {
 3750: 	uint8_t   	scratch;
 3751: 
 3752: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Get"
 3753: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3754: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3755: #endif
 3756: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3757: 
 3758: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3759: 
 3760: 	switch ( board_id )
 3761: 	{
 3762: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3763: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3764: 	}
 3765: 
 3766: 	*chip_select_behavior = (SPI_CSB_ENUM) ( scratch >> 4 ) & 0x03;
 3767: 	return SUCCESS;
 3768: }
 3769: 
 3778: int SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( int board_id, SPI_CSB_ENUM chip_select_behavior )
 3779: {
 3780: 	uint8_t   	scratch;
 3781: 	int			spi_config_symbol;
 3782: 
 3783: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set"
 3784: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3785: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3786: #endif
 3787: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3788: 
 3789: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3790: 
 3791: 	switch ( board_id )
 3792: 	{
 3793: 		case ID_IDI48:	spi_config_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_CONFIG;	break;
 3794: 		case ID_IDO48:	spi_config_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_CONFIG;	break;
 3795: 	}
 3796: 
 3797: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, spi_config_symbol, &scratch );
 3798: 
 3799: 	scratch &= ~0x30;
 3800: 	scratch |= (uint8_t) ( ( chip_select_behavior & 0x03 ) << 4 );
 3801: 
 3802: 	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, spi_config_symbol, scratch );
 3803: 	return SUCCESS;
 3804: }
 3805: 
 3814: int SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Set( int board_id, BOOL cs_to_channel1 )
 3815: {
 3816: 	int			spi_config_symbol;
 3817: 	uint8_t   	scratch;
 3818: 	uint8_t		mask = 0x40;
 3819: 
 3820: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Set"
 3821: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3822: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3823: #endif
 3824: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3825: 
 3826: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3827: 
 3828: 	switch ( board_id )
 3829: 	{
 3830: 		case ID_IDI48:	spi_config_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_CONFIG;	break;
 3831: 		case ID_IDO48:	spi_config_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_CONFIG;	break;
 3832: 	}
 3833: 
 3834: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, spi_config_symbol, &scratch );
 3835: 
 3836: 	if ( true == cs_to_channel1 ) scratch |= mask;
 3837: 	else                          scratch &= ~mask;
 3838: 
 3839: 	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, spi_config_symbol, scratch );
 3840: 	return SUCCESS;
 3841: }
 3842: 
 3851: int SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Get( int board_id, BOOL * cs_to_channel1 )
 3852: {
 3853: 	uint8_t   	scratch;
 3854: 	uint8_t		mask = 0x40;
 3855: 
 3856: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Get"
 3857: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3858: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3859: #endif
 3860: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3861: 
 3862: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3863: 
 3864: 	switch ( board_id )
 3865: 	{
 3866: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3867: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3868: 	}
 3869: 
 3870: 	if ( scratch & mask ) *cs_to_channel1 = true;
 3871: 	else                  *cs_to_channel1 = false;
 3872: 
 3873: 	return SUCCESS;
 3874: }
 3875: 
 3884: int SPI_Configuration_Set( int board_id, struct spi_cfg * cfg )
 3885: {
 3886: 	int			error_code;
 3887: 	double 		scratch;
 3888: 	double      hci_sec;     
 3889: 	uint8_t   	config;
 3890: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 3891: 
 3892: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Set"
 3893: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3894: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3895: #endif
 3896: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3897: 
 3898: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3899: 
 3900: 	config = (uint8_t) ( ( cfg->chip_select_behavior & 0x03 ) << 4 );
 3901: 	if ( cfg->sclk_polarity         ) config |= 0x01;
 3902: 	if ( cfg->sclk_phase            ) config |= 0x02;
 3903: 	if ( cfg->sdi_polarity          ) config |= 0x04;
 3904: 	if ( cfg->sdo_polarity          ) config |= 0x08;
 3905: 	if ( cfg->sdio_wrap             ) config |= 0x80;
 3906: 	if ( cfg->chip_select_route_ch1 ) config |= 0x40;
 3907: 
 3908: 	switch ( board_id )
 3909: 	{
 3910: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_CONFIG, config );	break;
 3911: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_CONFIG, config );	break;
 3912: 	}
 3913: 	
 3914: 
 3915: 	if ( cfg->clock_hz > 0 )
 3916: 	{ 
 3917: 		
 3918: 		error_code = SPI_Calculate_Clock( cfg->clock_hz, NULL, NULL, &(cfg->half_clock_interval) );
 3919: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
 3920: 	}
 3921: 	hci_sec = SPI_Calculate_Half_Clock_Interval_Sec( cfg->half_clock_interval );
 3922: 
 3923: 	if ( cfg->end_delay_ns > 0 )
 3924: 	{
 3925: 		scratch    = cfg->end_delay_ns * 1.0e-9;
 3926: 		error_code = SPI_Calculate_End_Cycle_Delay( hci_sec, 				
 3927: 			       	   	   	   	   	   	   	   	    scratch,           		
 3928: 			       	   	   	   	   	   	   	   	    NULL,            		
 3929: 			       	   	   	   	   	   	   	   	    NULL,                   
 3930: 			       	   	   	   	   	   	   	   	    &(cfg->end_cycle_delay) 
 3931: 			       	   	   	   	   	   	   	   	   );
 3932: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
 3933: 	}
 3934: 
 3935: 	switch ( board_id )
 3936: 	{
 3937: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_HCI_LSB, (uint8_t)( cfg->half_clock_interval & 0xFF ) );	break;
 3938: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_HCI_LSB, (uint8_t)( cfg->half_clock_interval & 0xFF ) );	break;
 3939: 	}
 3940: 	
 3941: 
 3942: 
 3943: 	switch ( board_id )
 3944: 	{
 3945: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_HCI_MSB, (uint8_t)( cfg->half_clock_interval >> 8   ) );	break;
 3946: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_HCI_MSB, (uint8_t)( cfg->half_clock_interval >> 8   ) );	break;
 3947: 	}
 3948: 	
 3949: 
 3950: 	switch ( board_id )
 3951: 	{
 3952: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_ECD, cfg->end_cycle_delay );	break;
 3953: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_ECD, cfg->end_cycle_delay );	break;
 3954: 	}
 3955: 	
 3956: 
 3957: 	if ( cfg != &(dataset->spi.cfg) )
 3958: 	{
 3959: 		memcpy( &(dataset->spi.cfg), &cfg, sizeof( struct spi_cfg ) );
 3960: 	}
 3961: 	return SUCCESS;
 3962: }
 3963: 
 3972: int SPI_Configuration_Get( int board_id, struct spi_cfg * cfg )
 3973: {
 3974: 	uint8_t   	scratch;
 3975: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 3976: 
 3977: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Configuration_Get"
 3978: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 3979: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 3980: #endif
 3981: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 3982: 
 3983: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 3984: 
 3985: 	switch ( board_id )
 3986: 	{
 3987: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3988: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_CONFIG, &scratch );	break;
 3989: 	}
 3990: 	
 3991: 
 3992: 	cfg->chip_select_route_ch1  = ( scratch & 0x40 ) ? true : false;
 3993: 	cfg->chip_select_behavior 	= (SPI_CSB_ENUM) ( scratch >> 4 ) & 0x03;
 3994:     cfg->sclk_polarity		 	= ( scratch & 0x01 ) ? true : false;
 3995:     cfg->sclk_phase   			= ( scratch & 0x02 ) ? true : false;
 3996: 	cfg->sdi_polarity 			= ( scratch & 0x04 ) ? true : false;
 3997: 	cfg->sdo_polarity 			= ( scratch & 0x08 ) ? true : false;
 3998: 	cfg->sdio_wrap    			= ( scratch & 0x80 ) ? true : false;
 3999: 
 4000: 	switch ( board_id )
 4001: 	{
 4002: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_HCI_LSB, &scratch );	break;
 4003: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_HCI_LSB, &scratch );	break;
 4004: 	}
 4005: 	
 4006: 	cfg->half_clock_interval = (uint16_t) scratch;
 4007: 	switch ( board_id )
 4008: 	{
 4009: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_HCI_MSB, &scratch );	break;
 4010: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_HCI_MSB, &scratch );	break;
 4011: 	}
 4012: 	
 4013: 	cfg->half_clock_interval |= ( (uint16_t) scratch) << 8;
 4014: 	switch ( board_id )
 4015: 	{
 4016: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_ECD, &(cfg->end_cycle_delay) );	break;
 4017: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_ECD, &(cfg->end_cycle_delay) );	break;
 4018: 	}
 4019: 	
 4020: 
 4021: 	cfg->clock_hz = 1.0 / ( 2.0 * CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC * ( 4.0 + ((double) cfg->half_clock_interval) ) );
 4022: 	cfg->end_delay_ns = 1.0e9 * CLOCK_PERIOD_SEC * 4.0 + 0.5 * ((double) cfg->end_cycle_delay) / cfg->clock_hz;
 4023: 
 4024: 	if ( cfg != &(dataset->spi.cfg) )
 4025: 	{
 4026: 		memcpy( &(dataset->spi.cfg), &cfg, sizeof( struct spi_cfg ) );
 4027: 	}
 4028: 	return SUCCESS;
 4029: }
 4030: 
 4040: int SPI_Report_Configuration_Text( struct spi_cfg * cfg, FILE * out )
 4041: {
 4042: 	fprintf( out, "################################### SPI Configuration:\n" );
 4043: 	fprintf( out, "sdio_wrap             = %s\n", cfg->sdio_wrap 	    	 ? "true" : "false" );
 4044: 	fprintf( out, "sdo_polarity          = %s\n", cfg->sdo_polarity 		 ? "true" : "false" );
 4045: 	fprintf( out, "sdi_polarity          = %s\n", cfg->sdi_polarity 		 ? "true" : "false" );
 4046: 	fprintf( out, "sclk_phase            = %s\n", cfg->sclk_phase 			 ? "true" : "false" );
 4047: 	fprintf( out, "sclk_polarity         = %s\n", cfg->sclk_polarity 		 ? "true" : "false" );
 4048: 	fprintf( out, "chip_select_route_ch1 = %s\n", cfg->chip_select_route_ch1 ? "true" : "false" );
 4049: 	fprintf( out, "chip_select_behavior  = " );
 4050: 
 4051: 	switch( cfg->chip_select_behavior )
 4052: 	{
 4053: 		case CSB_SOFTWARE:		fprintf( out, "CSB_SOFTWARE" 	);	break;
 4054: 		case CSB_BUFFER:		fprintf( out, "CSB_BUFFER" 		);	break;
 4055: 		case CSB_uint8_t:		fprintf( out, "CSB_uint8_t" 	);	break;
 4056: 		case CSB_uint16_t:		fprintf( out, "CSB_uint16_t" 	);	break;
 4057: 		default:                fprintf( out, "undefined" 		);	break;
 4058: 	}
 4059: 	fprintf( out, "\n" );
 4060: 
 4061: 	fprintf( out, "end_cycle_delay       = 0x%02X  (%d)\n", cfg->end_cycle_delay,     cfg->end_cycle_delay     );
 4062: 	fprintf( out, "half_clock_interval   = 0x%04X  (%d)\n", cfg->half_clock_interval, cfg->half_clock_interval );
 4063: 
 4064: 	fprintf( out, "clock_hz              = %f Hz\n", cfg->clock_hz );
 4065: 	fprintf( out, "end_delay_ns          = %f ns\n", cfg->end_delay_ns );
 4066: 	fprintf( out, "\n" );
 4067: 	return SUCCESS;
 4068: }
 4069: 
 4079: int SPI_Report_Status_Text( struct spi_status * status, FILE * out )
 4080: {
 4081: 	fprintf( out, "################################### SPI " );
 4082: 	if ( status->tx_status ) fprintf( out, "TX" );
 4083: 	else                     fprintf( out, "RX" );
 4084: 
 4085: 	fprintf( out, " Status:\n" );
 4086: 
 4087: 	fprintf( out, "full       = %s\n", status->full  ? "true" : "false" );
 4088: 	fprintf( out, "empty      = %s\n", status->empty ? "true" : "false" );
 4089: 	fprintf( out, "fifo size  = %d\n", status->fifo_size                );
 4090: 	fprintf( out, "fifo count = %d\n", status->fifo_count               );
 4091: 
 4092: 	return SUCCESS;
 4093: }
 4094: 
 4103: int SPI_Configuration_Initialize( struct spi_cfg * cfg )
 4104: {
 4105: 	cfg->sdio_wrap 				= false;
 4106: 	cfg->sdo_polarity 			= false;
 4107: 	cfg->sdi_polarity 			= false;
 4108: 	
 4114: 	cfg->sclk_phase 			= false;   
 4115: 	cfg->sclk_polarity 			= false;
 4116: 	cfg->chip_select_route_ch1  = false;    
 4117: 	cfg->chip_select_behavior 	= CSB_SOFTWARE;
 4118: 	cfg->end_cycle_delay 		= 0;		
 4119: 	cfg->half_clock_interval 	= 0;		
 4120: 
 4121: 	cfg->clock_hz 				= 0.0;
 4122: 	cfg->end_delay_ns 			= 0.0;
 4123: 
 4124: 	return SUCCESS;
 4125: }
 4126: 
 4127: 
 4145: int SPI_Status_Write( int board_id, struct spi_status * status )
 4146: {
 4147: 	uint8_t reg_tx_status;
 4148: 
 4149: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Write"
 4150: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4151: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4152: #endif
 4153: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4154: 
 4155: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4156: 
 4157: 	switch ( board_id )
 4158: 	{
 4159: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4160: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4161: 	}
 4162: 
 4163: 	status->fifo_count = (int)( reg_tx_status & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH );
 4164: 	status->full       = (BOOL)( reg_tx_status & 0x80 );
 4165: 	status->fifo_size  = (int) SPI_FIFO_SIZE;
 4166: 	status->empty      = (BOOL)( reg_tx_status & 0x40 );
 4167: 	status->tx_status  = true;
 4168: 	return SUCCESS;
 4169: }
 4170: 
 4187: void SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( int board_id, BOOL * full,  BOOL * empty,  size_t * bytes_available )
 4188: {
 4189: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4190: 	uint8_t reg_buf[4];
 4191: 	size_t  scratch;
 4192: 	size_t	index;
 4193: 	int     error_code;
 4194: #endif
 4195: 	uint8_t	reg_tx_status;
 4196: 
 4197: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status"
 4198: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4199: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4200: #endif
 4201: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4202: 
 4203: 
 4204: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4205: 	switch ( board_id )
 4206: 	{
 4207: 		case ID_IDI48:
 4208: 			for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ )
 4209: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS, &(reg_buf[index]) );
 4210: 			break;
 4211: 		case ID_IDO48:
 4212: 			for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ )
 4213: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS, &(reg_buf[index]) );
 4214: 			break;
 4215: 	}
 4216: 
 4217: 	error_code = 0;
 4218: 	for ( index = 1; index < 4; index++ )
 4219: 	{
 4220: 		scratch = (size_t)( reg_buf[index] & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH );
 4221: 		if ( scratch > ( (size_t)( reg_buf[0] & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH ) ) )
 4222: 		{
 4223: 			error_code = -1;
 4224: 		}
 4225: 
 4226: 		scratch = (size_t) ( reg_buf[index] & 0x40 );
 4227: 		if ( scratch != ( (size_t) ( reg_buf[0] & 0x40 ) ) )
 4228: 		{
 4229: 			error_code = -1;
 4230: 		}
 4231: 	}
 4232: 
 4233: 	if ( error_code < 0 )
 4234: 	{
 4235: 		printf( "###ERROR:  SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status: " );
 4236: 		for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ ) printf( ", 0x%02X", reg_buf[index] );
 4237: 		printf( "\n" );
 4238: 	}
 4239: 
 4240: 	reg_tx_status = reg_buf[0];
 4241: #else
 4242: 	switch ( board_id )
 4243: 	{
 4244: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4245: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4246: 	}
 4247: #endif
 4248: 
 4249: 	switch( reg_tx_status & 0xC0 )
 4250: 	{
 4251: 		case 0x00: *full = false;	*empty = false;		break;
 4252: 		case 0x40: *full = false;	*empty = true;		break;
 4253: 		case 0x80: *full = true;	*empty = false;		break;
 4254: 		case 0xC0: 
 4255: 			*full = true;
 4256: 			*empty = true;
 4257: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status-FullEmpty"
 4258: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4259: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4260: #endif
 4261: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4262: 
 4263: 			break;
 4264: 	}
 4265: 
 4266: 	*bytes_available = (size_t) SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH - (size_t)( reg_tx_status & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH );
 4267: }
 4268: 
 4276: BOOL SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Is_Full( int board_id )
 4277: {
 4278: 	uint8_t reg_tx_status;
 4279: 
 4280: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Is_Full"
 4281: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4282: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4283: #endif
 4284: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4285: 
 4286: 	switch ( board_id )
 4287: 	{
 4288: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4289: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4290: 	}
 4291: 	if ( reg_tx_status & 0x80 ) return true;
 4292: 	return false;
 4293: }
 4294: 
 4310: void SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status( int board_id, BOOL * empty,  size_t * bytes_available )
 4311: {
 4312: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4313: 	uint8_t reg_value[4];
 4314: 	size_t	index;
 4315: 	size_t  scratch;
 4316: 	int     error_code;
 4317: #endif
 4318: 	uint8_t	reg_rx_status;
 4319: 
 4320: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status"
 4321: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4322: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4323: #endif
 4324: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4325: 
 4326: 
 4327: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4328: 	switch ( board_id )
 4329: 	{
 4330: 		case ID_IDI48:
 4331: 			for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ )
 4332: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_RX_STATUS, &(reg_value[index]) );
 4333: 			break;
 4334: 		case ID_IDO48:
 4335: 			for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ )
 4336: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_RX_STATUS, &(reg_value[index]) );
 4337: 			break;
 4338: 	}
 4339: 
 4340: 	error_code = 0;
 4341: 	for ( index = 1; index < 4; index++ )
 4342: 	{
 4343: 		scratch = (size_t)( reg_value[index] & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH );
 4344: 		if ( scratch < ( (size_t)( reg_value[0] & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH ) ) )
 4345: 		{
 4346: 			error_code = -1;
 4347: 		}
 4348: 
 4349: 		scratch = (size_t) ( reg_value[index] & 0x40 );
 4350: 		if ( scratch != ( (size_t) ( reg_value[0] & 0x40 ) ) )
 4351: 		{
 4352: 			error_code = -1;
 4353: 		}
 4354: 	}
 4355: 
 4356: 	if ( error_code < 0 )
 4357: 	{
 4358: 		printf( "###ERROR:  SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status: " );
 4359: 		for ( index = 0; index < 4; index++ ) printf( ", 0x%02X", reg_value[index] );
 4360: 		printf( "\n" );
 4361: 	}
 4362: 	reg_rx_status = reg_value[0];
 4363: #else
 4364: 	switch ( board_id )
 4365: 	{
 4366: 		case ID_IDI48:
 4367: 			IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );
 4368: 			break;
 4369: 		case ID_IDO48:
 4370: 			IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );
 4371: 			break;
 4372: 	}
 4373: #endif
 4374: 
 4375: 	
 4376: 	*bytes_available = (size_t)( reg_rx_status & SPI_FIFO_SIZE_BIT_WIDTH );
 4377: 	*empty           = (BOOL)( reg_rx_status & 0x40 );
 4378: }
 4379: 
 4397: int SPI_Status_Read( int board_id, struct spi_status * status )
 4398: {
 4399: 	uint8_t reg_rx_status;
 4400: 
 4401: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Read"
 4402: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4403: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4404: #endif
 4405: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4406: 
 4407: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4408: 
 4409: 	switch ( board_id )
 4410: 	{
 4411: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );	break;
 4412: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );	break;
 4413: 	}
 4414: 
 4415: 	status->fifo_count = (int)( reg_rx_status & 0x1F );
 4416: 	status->full       = (BOOL)( reg_rx_status & 0x80 );
 4417: 	status->fifo_size  = (int) SPI_FIFO_SIZE;
 4418: 	status->empty      = (BOOL)( reg_rx_status & 0x40 );
 4419: 	status->tx_status  = false;
 4420: 	return SUCCESS;
 4421: }
 4422: 
 4430: BOOL SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Is_Not_Empty( int board_id )
 4431: {
 4432: 	uint8_t reg_tx_status;
 4433: 
 4434: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Is_Not_Empty"
 4435: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4436: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4437: #endif
 4438: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4439: 
 4440: 	switch ( board_id )
 4441: 	{
 4442: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4443: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS, &reg_tx_status );	break;
 4444: 	}
 4445: 	if ( reg_tx_status & 0x40 ) return false;
 4446: 	return true;
 4447: }
 4448: 
 4456: BOOL SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Is_Not_Empty( int board_id )
 4457: {
 4458: 	uint8_t reg_rx_status;
 4459: 
 4460: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Is_Not_Empty"
 4461: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4462: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4463: #endif
 4464: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4465: 
 4466: 	switch ( board_id )
 4467: 	{
 4468: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );	break;
 4469: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_RX_STATUS, &reg_rx_status );	break;
 4470: 	}
 4471: 	if ( reg_rx_status & 0x40 ) return false;
 4472: 	return true;
 4473: }
 4474: 
 4479: #define SPI_COMMIT_BIT_POSITION  0x01
 4480: 
 4481: 
 4492: int SPI_Commit( int board_id, uint8_t commit )
 4493: {
 4494: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Commit"
 4495: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4496: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4497: #endif
 4498: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4499: 
 4500: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4501: 	commit = commit & SPI_COMMIT_BIT_POSITION;
 4502: 	switch ( board_id )
 4503: 	{
 4504: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_COMMIT, commit );	break;
 4505: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_COMMIT, commit );	break;
 4506: 	}
 4507: 	return SUCCESS;
 4508: }
 4509: 
 4520: int SPI_Commit_Get( int board_id, uint8_t * commit )
 4521: {
 4522: 	uint8_t value;
 4523: 
 4524: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Commit_Get"
 4525: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4526: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4527: #endif
 4528: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4529: 
 4530: 
 4531: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4532: 	switch ( board_id )
 4533: 	{
 4534: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_COMMIT, &value );	break;
 4535: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_COMMIT, &value );	break;
 4536: 	}
 4537: 	*commit = value & SPI_COMMIT_BIT_POSITION;
 4538: 	return SUCCESS;
 4539: }
 4540: 
 4547: BOOL SPI_Commit_Is_Inactive( int board_id )
 4548: {
 4549: 	uint8_t value;
 4550: 
 4551: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Commit_Is_Inactive"
 4552: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4553: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4554: #endif
 4555: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4556: 
 4557: 	switch ( board_id )
 4558: 	{
 4559: 		case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_COMMIT, &value );	break;
 4560: 		case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_COMMIT, &value );	break;
 4561: 	}
 4562: 	
 4563: 	if ( 0 == (value & SPI_COMMIT_BIT_POSITION) ) return true;
 4564: 	return false;
 4565: }
 4566: 
 4582: int SPI_FIFO_Write( int board_id, const void * buffer, size_t size, size_t count, FILE * fd_log )
 4583: {
 4584: 	int 	error_code;       
 4585: 	size_t	bytes_available;
 4586: 	BOOL	empty;
 4587: 	BOOL	full;
 4588: 	size_t  index;
 4589: 	size_t  qty_objects;
 4590: 	size_t 	qty_bytes;
 4591: 	int		reg_symbol;
 4592: 
 4593: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_FIFO_Write"
 4594: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4595: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4596: #endif
 4597: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4598: 
 4599: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
 4600: 
 4601: 	if ( (size * count) > SPI_FIFO_SIZE ) return -EC_PARAMETER;
 4602: 
 4603: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4604: 
 4605: 	SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( board_id, &full, &empty, &bytes_available );
 4606: 
 4607: 	qty_objects =  bytes_available / size; 
 4608: 	if ( count < qty_objects ) qty_objects = count;
 4609: 
 4610: 	qty_bytes = qty_objects * size;
 4611: 
 4612: 
 4613: 
 4614: 
 4615: 	switch ( board_id )
 4616: 	{
 4617: 		case ID_IDI48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4618: 		case ID_IDO48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4619: 	}
 4620: 	for ( index = 0; index < qty_bytes; index++ ) IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, ((uint8_t *) buffer)[index] );
 4621: 
 4622: 	if ( NULL != fd_log )
 4623: 	{
 4624: 		error_code = fwrite( buffer, size, qty_objects, fd_log );
 4625: 	}
 4626: 
 4627: 	if ( SUCCESS == error_code ) error_code = ( (int) qty_objects );
 4628: 	return error_code;
 4629: }
 4630: 
 4646: int SPI_FIFO_Read( int board_id, const void * buffer, size_t size, size_t count, FILE * fd_log )
 4647: {
 4648: 	int 	error_code;       
 4649: 	size_t	bytes_available;
 4650: 	BOOL	empty;
 4651: 	size_t  index;
 4652: 	size_t  qty_objects;
 4653: 	size_t 	qty_bytes;
 4654: 	int		reg_symbol;
 4655: 
 4656: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_FIFO_Read"
 4657: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4658: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4659: #endif
 4660: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4661: 
 4662: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
 4663: 
 4664: 	if ( (size * count) > SPI_FIFO_SIZE ) return -EC_PARAMETER;
 4665: 
 4666: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) ) return -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 4667: 
 4668: 	SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status( board_id, &empty, &bytes_available );
 4669: 
 4670: 	qty_objects =  bytes_available / size; 
 4671: 	if ( count < qty_objects ) qty_objects = count;
 4672: 
 4673: 	qty_bytes = qty_objects * size;
 4674: 
 4675: 	switch ( board_id )
 4676: 	{
 4677: 		case ID_IDI48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4678: 		case ID_IDO48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4679: 	}
 4680: 	for ( index = 0; index < qty_bytes; index++ ) IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, &(((uint8_t *) buffer)[index]) );
 4681: 
 4682: 	if ( NULL != fd_log )
 4683: 	{
 4684: 		error_code = fwrite( buffer, size, qty_objects, fd_log );
 4685: 	}
 4686: 
 4687: 	if ( SUCCESS == error_code ) error_code = ( (int) qty_objects );
 4688: 	return error_code;
 4689: }
 4690: 
 4691: 
 4695: static void SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read( int 			board_id,
 4696: 											 size_t		 	object_size,
 4697: 											 size_t			object_total_count,
 4698: 											 BOOL			active_rx,
 4699: 											 size_t *		index_rx,
 4700: 											 const void * 	rx_buffer
 4701: 										   )
 4702: {
 4703: 	BOOL	rx_empty;
 4704: 	int		reg_symbol;
 4705: 	size_t	rx_bytes_available;
 4706: 	size_t	object_qty;
 4707: 	size_t	object_remaining;
 4708: 	size_t	index_object;
 4709: 	size_t	index;
 4710: 	size_t  index_byte;
 4711: 	uint8_t bit_bucket;   	
 4712: 
 4713: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4714: 	printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read: " );
 4715: #endif
 4716: 
 4717: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read"
 4718: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4719: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4720: #endif
 4721: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4722: 
 4723: 	
 4724: 	SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status( board_id, &rx_empty, &rx_bytes_available );
 4725: 	if ( rx_bytes_available >= object_size )
 4726: 	{ 
 4727: 		object_qty = rx_bytes_available / object_size;		
 4728: 		object_remaining = object_total_count - *index_rx;	
 4729: 		if ( object_qty > object_remaining )
 4730: 		{ 
 4731: 			object_qty = object_total_count - *index_rx;	
 4732: 		}
 4733: 
 4734: 		switch ( board_id )
 4735: 		{
 4736: 			case ID_IDI48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4737: 			case ID_IDO48:	reg_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_DATA;	break;
 4738: 		}
 4739: 
 4740: 		if ( active_rx )
 4741: 		{
 4742: 			for ( index_object = 0; index_object < object_qty; index_object++ )
 4743: 			{
 4744: 				index_byte = (*index_rx) * object_size;
 4745: 				for ( index = 0; index < object_size; index++ )
 4746: 				{
 4747: 					IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, &(((uint8_t *) rx_buffer)[index_byte + index]) );
 4748: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4749: global_internal_rx_byte_count++;
 4750: #endif
 4751: 				}
 4752: 				*index_rx = *index_rx + 1;
 4753: 			}
 4754: 		}
 4755: 		else
 4756: 		{
 4757: 			for ( index_object = 0; index_object < object_qty; index_object++ )
 4758: 			{
 4759: 				index_byte = (*index_rx) * object_size;
 4760: 				for ( index = 0; index < object_size; index++ )
 4761: 				{
 4762: 					IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, &bit_bucket ); 
 4763: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4764: global_internal_rx_byte_count++;
 4765: #endif
 4766: 				}
 4767: 				*index_rx = *index_rx + 1;
 4768: 			}
 4769: 		}
 4770: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4771: printf( "object_qty=%u, rx_bytes_available=%u, object_remaining=%u, object_size=%u", object_qty, rx_bytes_available, object_remaining, object_size );
 4772: #endif
 4773: 	}
 4774: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4775: printf( ", index_rx=%u\n", *index_rx );
 4776: #endif
 4777: 
 4778: }
 4779: 
 4785: static void SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit(  int				board_id,
 4786: 												size_t			object_size,
 4787: 												SPI_CSB_ENUM	csb,
 4788: 												BOOL  			commit_ready,
 4789: 												BOOL * 			commit_valid
 4790: 											 )
 4791: {
 4792: 
 4793: 
 4794: 
 4795: 	(void)	object_size;
 4796: 
 4797: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit"
 4798: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4799: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4800: #endif
 4801: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4802: 
 4803: 
 4804: 
 4805: 	if ( true == commit_ready )
 4806: 	{
 4807: 		if ( false == *commit_valid )
 4808: 		{
 4809: 			if ( CSB_SOFTWARE  != csb ) SPI_Commit( board_id, 0xFF );    
 4810: 		}
 4811: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4812: printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit:  commit_valid = true\n" );
 4813: #endif
 4814: 		*commit_valid = true;
 4815: 	}
 4816: 	else
 4817: 	{
 4818: 		if ( CSB_BUFFER == csb )
 4819: 		{	
 4820: 			if ( SPI_Commit_Is_Inactive( board_id ) )
 4821: 			{
 4822: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4823: printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit:  commit_valid = false  (CSB = BUFFER)\n" );
 4824: #endif
 4825: 				*commit_valid = false; 
 4826: 			}
 4827: 		}
 4828: 		else
 4829: 		{
 4830: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4831: printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit:  commit_valid = false\n" );
 4832: #endif
 4833: 			*commit_valid = false; 
 4834: 		}
 4835: 	}
 4836: }
 4837: 
 4841: static void SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write(	int				board_id,
 4842: 												size_t		 	object_size,
 4843: 												size_t			object_total_count,
 4844: 												SPI_CSB_ENUM	csb,
 4845: 												BOOL			active_tx,
 4846: 												BOOL 			commit_valid,
 4847: 												BOOL * 			commit_ready,
 4848: 												size_t *		index_tx,
 4849: 												const void * 	tx_buffer
 4850: 										   )
 4851: {
 4852: 	BOOL 			tx_full;
 4853: 	BOOL 			tx_empty;
 4854: 	int				reg_symbol;
 4855: 	size_t 			tx_bytes_available;
 4856: 	size_t			object_qty;
 4857: 	size_t			object_remaining;
 4858: 	size_t			index_object;
 4859: 	size_t			index;
 4860: 	size_t  		index_byte;
 4861: 
 4862: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4863: 	int				reg_tx_status, reg_rx_status;
 4864: 	uint8_t			reg_tx_status_value, reg_rx_status_value;
 4865: #endif
 4866: 
 4867: 	const uint8_t  	tx_dummy_value = 0x00;
 4868: 
 4869: 
 4870: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4871: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write: " );
 4872: #endif
 4873: 
 4874: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write"
 4875: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 4876: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 4877: #endif
 4878: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 4879: 
 4880: 	if ( false == commit_valid ) 
 4881: 	{
 4882: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4883: printf( " GO" );
 4884: #endif
 4885: 		if ( false == *commit_ready )
 4886: 		{ 
 4887: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4888: printf( ", FILL" );
 4889: #endif
 4890: 			
 4891: 			SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( board_id, &tx_full, &tx_empty, &tx_bytes_available );
 4892: 			if ( tx_bytes_available >= object_size )
 4893: 			{	
 4894: 				object_qty = tx_bytes_available / object_size; 
 4895: 				object_remaining = object_total_count - *index_tx;
 4896: 				if ( object_qty > object_remaining )
 4897: 				{ 
 4898: 					object_qty = object_total_count - *index_tx;
 4899: 				}
 4900: 
 4901: 				if ( CSB_BUFFER   == csb )
 4902: 				{ 
 4903: 					if ( object_qty >= 1 ) object_qty = 1;
 4904: 				}
 4905: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4906: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write: TX object_qty = %d\n", (int) object_qty );
 4907: #endif
 4908: 				switch ( board_id )
 4909: 				{
 4910: 					case ID_IDI48:
 4911: 						reg_symbol = (int) IDI_SPI_DATA;
 4912: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4913: 						reg_tx_status = IDI_SPI_TX_STATUS;
 4914: 						reg_rx_status = IDI_SPI_RX_STATUS;
 4915: #endif
 4916: 						break;
 4917: 					case ID_IDO48:
 4918: 						reg_symbol = (int) IDO_SPI_DATA;
 4919: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4920: 						reg_tx_status = IDO_SPI_TX_STATUS;
 4921: 						reg_rx_status = IDO_SPI_RX_STATUS;
 4922: #endif
 4923: 						break;
 4924: 				}
 4925: 
 4926: 				if ( active_tx )
 4927: 				{
 4928: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4929: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write: TX active\n" );
 4930: #endif
 4931: 
 4932: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4933: printf( ", DSTATUS:" );
 4934: #endif
 4935: 					for ( index_object = 0; index_object < object_qty; index_object++ )
 4936: 					{
 4937: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4938: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write: TX bytes:" );
 4939: #endif
 4940: 						index_byte = *index_tx * object_size;
 4941: 						for ( index = 0; index < object_size; index++ )
 4942: 						{
 4943: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4944: printf( " 0x%02X", ((uint8_t *) tx_buffer)[index_byte + index] );
 4945: #endif
 4946: 							IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, ((uint8_t *) tx_buffer)[index_byte + index] );
 4947: 
 4948: 
 4949: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4950: global_internal_tx_byte_count++;
 4951: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 4952: delay( 200  );  
 4953: #endif
 4954: IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_tx_status, &reg_tx_status_value );
 4955: IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_rx_status, &reg_rx_status_value );
 4956: printf( " [0x%02X.0x%02X]", reg_tx_status_value, reg_rx_status_value );
 4957: #endif
 4958: 
 4959: 
 4960: 						}
 4961: 						*index_tx = *index_tx + 1;
 4962: 					}
 4963: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4964: printf( "\n" );
 4965: #endif
 4966: 				}
 4967: 				else
 4968: 				{
 4969: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 4970: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write: TX inactive\n" );
 4971: #endif
 4972: 
 4973: 
 4974: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4975: printf( ", NSTATUS:" );
 4976: #endif
 4977: 					for ( index_object = 0; index_object < object_qty; index_object++ )
 4978: 					{
 4979: 						
 4980: 						for ( index = 0; index < object_size; index++ )
 4981: 						{
 4982: 							IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_symbol, tx_dummy_value ); 
 4983: 
 4984: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 4985: global_internal_tx_byte_count++;
 4986: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 4987: delay( 200  );  
 4988: #endif
 4989: IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_tx_status, &reg_tx_status_value );
 4990: IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, reg_rx_status, &reg_rx_status_value );
 4991: printf( " [0x%02X.0x%02X]", reg_tx_status_value, reg_rx_status_value );
 4992: #endif
 4993: 
 4994: 						}
 4995: 						*index_tx = *index_tx + 1;
 4996: 					}
 4997: 
 4998: 				}
 4999: 				*commit_ready = true;
 5000: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5001: printf( ", object_qty=%u, tx_bytes_available=%u, object_remaining=%u, object_size=%u", object_qty, tx_bytes_available, object_remaining, object_size );
 5002: printf( ", index_tx=%u", *index_tx );
 5003: #endif
 5004: 
 5005: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5006: printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write TX request\n" );
 5007: #endif
 5008: 			}
 5009: 			else
 5010: 			{
 5011: 				
 5012: printf( ", FULL" );
 5013: 			}
 5014: 		}
 5015: 		else
 5016: 		{
 5017: 			
 5018: printf( ", FULL" );
 5019: 		}
 5020: 	}
 5021: 	else
 5022: 	{ 
 5023: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5024: printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write TX ack\n" );
 5025: #endif
 5026: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5027: printf( " ACK" );
 5028: #endif
 5029: 		*commit_ready = false;
 5030: 	}
 5031: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5032: printf( "\n" );
 5033: #endif
 5034: }
 5035: 
 5059: int SPI_Data_Write_Read( 	int 		 board_id,
 5060: 							size_t		 object_size,  		
 5061: 							size_t		 tx_object_count, 	
 5062: 							const void * tx_buffer,
 5063: 							size_t		 rx_object_count,  	
 5064: 							const void * rx_buffer
 5065: 						)
 5066: {
 5067: 	int				error_code;
 5068: 	SPI_CSB_ENUM	csb;
 5069: 	size_t			rx_bytes_available;
 5070: 	BOOL			rx_empty;
 5071: 	size_t			tx_bytes_available;
 5072: 	BOOL			active_tx;
 5073: 	BOOL			active_rx;
 5074: 	BOOL			tx_empty;
 5075: 	BOOL			tx_full;
 5076: 	size_t 			index_tx;			
 5077: 	size_t 			index_rx;
 5078: 
 5079: 
 5080: 
 5081: 
 5082: 
 5083: 	BOOL 			commit_valid;
 5084: 	BOOL			commit_ready;
 5085: 	uint8_t 		bit_bucket; 
 5086: 
 5087: 
 5088: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5089: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5090: 	static size_t   internal_count = 0;
 5091: #endif
 5092: #endif
 5093: 
 5094: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 5095: 
 5096: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write_Read"
 5097: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5098: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 5099: #endif
 5100: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5101: 
 5102: 
 5103: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5104: 	printf( "*** SPI_Data_Write_Read:  Entry.\n" );
 5105: #endif
 5106: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5107: 	printf( "*** SPI_Data_Write_Read:  Entry.\n" );
 5108: #endif
 5109: 
 5110: 	index_tx = 0;
 5111: 	index_rx = 0;
 5112: 
 5113: 
 5114: 
 5115: 	
 5116: 	if ( ( NULL == tx_buffer ) && ( NULL == rx_buffer ) )
 5117: 	{ 
 5118: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5119: 		goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5120: 	}
 5121: 	if ( SPI_IsNotPresent( board_id ) )
 5122: 	{ 
 5123: 		error_code = -EC_SPI_NOT_FOUND;
 5124: 		goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5125: 	}
 5126: 
 5127: 	
 5128: 	if ( ( NULL != tx_buffer ) && ( NULL != rx_buffer ) )
 5129: 	{ 
 5130: 		if ( tx_object_count != rx_object_count )
 5131: 		{ 
 5132: 			error_code = -EC_SPI_BUFFER_MISMATCH;
 5133: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5134: 		}
 5135: 	}
 5136: 	if ( NULL != tx_buffer )
 5137: 	{ 
 5138: 		active_tx = true;
 5139: 	}
 5140: 	else
 5141: 	{ 
 5142: 		tx_object_count = rx_object_count;
 5143: 		active_tx       = false; 
 5144: 	}
 5145: 	if ( NULL != rx_buffer )
 5146: 	{ 
 5147: 		active_rx        = true;
 5148: 	}
 5149: 	else
 5150: 	{ 
 5151: 		rx_object_count = tx_object_count;
 5152: 		active_rx       = false; 
 5153: 	}
 5154: 
 5155: 	
 5156: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Get( board_id, &csb );
 5157: 
 5158: 	if ( CSB_SOFTWARE == csb )
 5159: 	{ 
 5160: 		uint8_t chip_select;
 5161: 		if ( 0 == SPI_Commit_Get( board_id, &chip_select ) )
 5162: 		{ 
 5163: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5164: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read: Warning Chip select not active, setting it now\n" );
 5165: #endif
 5166: 			SPI_Commit( board_id, 0xFF );
 5167: 		}
 5168: 	}
 5169: 
 5170: 	if ( CSB_uint16_t == csb )
 5171: 	{ 
 5172: 		if ( object_size & 0x01 )
 5173: 		{ 
 5174: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read: Object Size is set to " );
 5175: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5176: 			printf( "%d", object_size );
 5177: #else
 5178: 			printf( "%lu", object_size );
 5179: #endif
 5180: 			printf( ", and ought to be set to 2\n" );
 5181: 			error_code = -EC_SPI_BUFFER_SIZE_ODD;
 5182: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5183: 		}
 5184: 	}
 5185: 
 5186: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5187: 	printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read:\n" );
 5188: 	#if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5189: 	printf( "  object_size       = %d\n", object_size );
 5190: 	printf( "  tx_object_count   = %d\n", tx_object_count );
 5191: 	printf( "  rx_object_count   = %d\n", rx_object_count );
 5192: 	printf( "  index_tx          = %d\n", index_tx );
 5193: 	printf( "  index_rx          = %d\n", index_rx );
 5194: 	printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5195: 	printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5196: 	#else
 5197: 	printf( "  object_size       = %lu\n", object_size );
 5198: 	printf( "  tx_object_count   = %lu\n", tx_object_count );
 5199: 	printf( "  rx_object_count   = %lu\n", rx_object_count );
 5200: 	printf( "  index_tx          = %lu\n", index_tx );
 5201: 	printf( "  index_rx          = %lu\n", index_rx );
 5202: 	printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5203: 	printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5204: 	#endif
 5205: 	printf( "  active_tx         = %s\n", active_tx ? "true" : "false" );
 5206: 	printf( "  active_rx         = %s\n", active_rx ? "true" : "false" );
 5207: 
 5208: 	if ( NULL != tx_buffer )
 5209: 	{ 
 5210: 		size_t count = object_size * tx_object_count;
 5211: 		if ( count > HEX_DUMP_BYTES_PER_LINE ) count = HEX_DUMP_BYTES_PER_LINE;
 5212: 		Hex_Dump_Line( 0, count, (uint8_t *) tx_buffer, stdout );
 5213: 	}
 5214: #endif
 5215: 
 5216: 
 5217: 	if ( CSB_BUFFER == csb )
 5218: 	{ 
 5221: 		if ( object_size > SPI_FIFO_SIZE )
 5222: 		{
 5223: 			error_code = -EC_SPI_OBJECT_SIZE;
 5224: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5225: 		}
 5226: 	}
 5227: 
 5228: 
 5229: 	
 5230: 	
 5231: 	SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( board_id, &tx_full, &tx_empty, &tx_bytes_available );
 5232: 	if ( ( false == tx_empty ) && ( CSB_SOFTWARE != csb ) ) SPI_Commit( board_id, 0xFF );
 5233: 	do
 5234: 	{ 
 5235: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5236: 		if ( dataset->quit_application ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE_CTRLC;
 5237: 		if ( Character_Get( NULL )     ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE;
 5238: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code     )
 5239: 		{
 5240: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read initial empty tx\n" );
 5241: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5242: 		}
 5243: 		SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( board_id, &tx_full, &tx_empty, &tx_bytes_available );
 5244: 	} while ( false == tx_empty );
 5245: 
 5246: 	
 5247: 	do
 5248: 	{ 
 5249: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5250: 		if ( dataset->quit_application ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE_CTRLC;
 5251: 		if ( Character_Get( NULL )     ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE;
 5252: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code     )
 5253: 		{
 5254: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read initial empty rx\n" );
 5255: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5256: 		}
 5257: 		SPI_Status_Read_FIFO_Status( board_id, &rx_empty, &rx_bytes_available );
 5258: 		if ( false == rx_empty )
 5259: 		{
 5260: 			switch ( board_id )
 5261: 			{
 5262: 				case ID_IDI48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_DATA, &bit_bucket  ); 	break;
 5263: 				case ID_IDO48:	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDO_SPI_DATA, &bit_bucket  ); 	break;
 5264: 			}
 5265: 		}
 5266: 	} while ( false == rx_empty );
 5267: 
 5268: 	index_tx     = 0;
 5269: 	index_rx     = 0;
 5270: 	commit_valid = false;
 5271: 	commit_ready = false;
 5272: 	while ( index_tx < tx_object_count )
 5273: 	{
 5274: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5275: 		if ( dataset->quit_application ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE_CTRLC;
 5276: 		if ( Character_Get( NULL )     ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE;
 5277: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code     )
 5278: 		{
 5279: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read main loop\n" );
 5280: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5281: 		}
 5282: 
 5283: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5284: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5285: 		delay( 250  );  
 5286: 		
 5287: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read( board_id, object_size, tx_object_count, active_rx, &index_rx, rx_buffer );
 5288: 		delay( 250   );
 5289: # endif
 5290: #endif
 5291: 
 5292: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5293: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5294: 		internal_count++;
 5295: 		printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read:  LOOP: internal_count = %u\n", internal_count );
 5296: 		printf( "  object_size       = %d\n", object_size );
 5297: 		printf( "  tx_object_count   = %d\n", tx_object_count );
 5298: 		printf( "  rx_object_count   = %d\n", rx_object_count );
 5299: 		printf( "  index_tx          = %d\n", index_tx );
 5300: 		printf( "  index_rx          = %d\n", index_rx );
 5301: 		printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5302: 		printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5303: 		delay( 1000  );
 5304: # endif
 5305: #endif
 5306: 
 5307: 		
 5310: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read( board_id, object_size, tx_object_count, active_rx, &index_rx, rx_buffer );
 5311: 
 5312: 
 5313: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5314: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5315: 		if ( index_rx != index_tx )
 5316: 		{
 5317: 			error_code = -EC_SPI_BUFFER_MISMATCH;
 5318: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read:  MISMATCH: internal_count = %u\n", internal_count );
 5319: 
 5320: 			#if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5321: 			printf( "  object_size       = %d\n", object_size );
 5322: 			printf( "  tx_object_count   = %d\n", tx_object_count );
 5323: 			printf( "  rx_object_count   = %d\n", rx_object_count );
 5324: 			printf( "  index_tx          = %d\n", index_tx );
 5325: 			printf( "  index_rx          = %d\n", index_rx );
 5326: 			printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5327: 			printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5328: 			#else
 5329: 			printf( "  object_size       = %lu\n", object_size );
 5330: 			printf( "  tx_object_count   = %lu\n", tx_object_count );
 5331: 			printf( "  rx_object_count   = %lu\n", rx_object_count );
 5332: 			printf( "  index_tx          = %lu\n", index_tx );
 5333: 			printf( "  index_rx          = %lu\n", index_rx );
 5334: 			printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5335: 			printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5336: 			#endif
 5337: 			printf( "  active_tx         = %s\n", active_tx ? "true" : "false" );
 5338: 			printf( "  active_rx         = %s\n", active_rx ? "true" : "false" );
 5339: 
 5340: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5341: 		}
 5342: # endif
 5343: #endif
 5344: 
 5345: 		
 5346: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit( board_id, object_size, csb, commit_ready, &commit_valid );
 5347: 
 5348: 		
 5351: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Write( 	board_id,
 5352: 											object_size,
 5353: 											tx_object_count,
 5354: 											csb,
 5355: 											active_tx,
 5356: 											commit_valid,
 5357: 											&commit_ready,
 5358: 											&index_tx,
 5359: 											tx_buffer
 5360: 										);
 5361: 
 5362: 
 5363: 
 5364: 		
 5365: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit( board_id, object_size, csb, commit_ready, &commit_valid );
 5366: 
 5367: 	}
 5368: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5369: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read: Post write operations\n" );
 5370: #endif
 5371: 
 5372: 	
 5373: 	do
 5374: 	{
 5375: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5376: 		if ( dataset->quit_application ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE_CTRLC;
 5377: 		if ( Character_Get( NULL )     ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE;
 5378: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code     )
 5379: 		{
 5380: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read status ending portion\n" );
 5381: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5382: 		}
 5383: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Commit( board_id, object_size, csb, commit_ready, &commit_valid );
 5384: 		SPI_Status_Write_FIFO_Status( board_id, &tx_full, &tx_empty, &tx_bytes_available );
 5385: 	} while ( false == tx_empty );
 5386: 
 5387: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5388: printf( "  SPI_Data_Write_Read: Post Read Begin\n" );
 5389: #endif
 5390: 
 5391: 	
 5392: 	while ( index_rx != index_tx )
 5393: 	{ 
 5394: 		error_code = SUCCESS;
 5395: 		if ( dataset->quit_application ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE_CTRLC;
 5396: 		if ( Character_Get( NULL )     ) error_code = -EC_APP_TERMINATE;
 5397: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code     )
 5398: 		{
 5399: 			printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read status ending receive loop\n" );
 5400: 			goto SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit;
 5401: 		}
 5402: 		SPI_Data_Write_Read_Helper_Read( board_id, object_size, tx_object_count, active_rx, &index_rx, rx_buffer );
 5403: 	}
 5404: 	return SUCCESS;
 5405: 
 5406: SPI_Data_Write_Read_Error_Exit:
 5407: 
 5408: 
 5409: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 5410: 	printf( "SPI_Data_Write_Read:\n" );
 5411: 	#if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 5412: 	printf( "  object_size       = %d\n", object_size );
 5413: 	printf( "  tx_object_count   = %d\n", tx_object_count );
 5414: 	printf( "  rx_object_count   = %d\n", rx_object_count );
 5415: 	printf( "  index_tx          = %d\n", index_tx );
 5416: 	printf( "  index_rx          = %d\n", index_rx );
 5417: 	printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5418: 	printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5419: 	#else
 5420: 	printf( "  object_size       = %lu\n", object_size );
 5421: 	printf( "  tx_object_count   = %lu\n", tx_object_count );
 5422: 	printf( "  rx_object_count   = %lu\n", rx_object_count );
 5423: 	printf( "  index_tx          = %lu\n", index_tx );
 5424: 	printf( "  index_rx          = %lu\n", index_rx );
 5425: 	printf( "  tx_buffer         = %p\n", tx_buffer );
 5426: 	printf( "  rx_buffer         = %p\n", rx_buffer );
 5427: 	#endif
 5428: 	printf( "  active_tx         = %s\n", active_tx ? "true" : "false" );
 5429: 	printf( "  active_rx         = %s\n", active_rx ? "true" : "false" );
 5430: 
 5431: 	printf( "  global_internal_tx_byte_count = %u\n", global_internal_tx_byte_count );
 5432: 	printf( "  global_internal_rx_byte_count = %u\n", global_internal_rx_byte_count );
 5433: #endif
 5434: 
 5435: 
 5436: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write_Read"
 5437: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5438: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, error_code );
 5439: #endif
 5440: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5441: 
 5442: 	return error_code;
 5443: }
 5444: 
 5453: 
 5459: 
 5460: int SPI_Data_Write( int				board_id,
 5461: 					const void *   	tx_buffer,
 5462: 					size_t			tx_object_size,  	
 5463: 					size_t 			tx_object_count, 	
 5464: 					FILE *			fd_log      		
 5465: 	  	 	 	  )
 5466: {
 5467: 	int error_code;
 5468: 
 5469: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write"
 5470: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5471: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 5472: #endif
 5473: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5474: 
 5475: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read(	board_id,
 5476: 										tx_object_size,
 5477: 										tx_object_count,
 5478: 										tx_buffer,
 5479: 										0,			
 5480: 										NULL		
 5481: 									);
 5482: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto SPI_Data_Write_Error_Exit;
 5483: 
 5484: 	if ( NULL != fd_log )
 5485: 	{
 5486: 		error_code = fwrite( tx_buffer, tx_object_size, tx_object_count, fd_log );
 5487: 	}
 5488: 	if ( error_code < 0 ) goto SPI_Data_Write_Error_Exit;
 5489: 
 5490: 	return SUCCESS;
 5491: 
 5492: SPI_Data_Write_Error_Exit:
 5493: 
 5494: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Write"
 5495: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5496: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, error_code );
 5497: #endif
 5498: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5499: 
 5500: 	return error_code;
 5501: }
 5502: 
 5511: 
 5517: int SPI_Data_Read( 	int				board_id,
 5518: 					const void *   	rx_buffer,
 5519: 					size_t			rx_object_size,  	
 5520: 					size_t 			rx_object_count, 	
 5521: 					FILE *			fd_log      		
 5522: 	  	  	  	 )
 5523: {
 5524: 	int error_code;
 5525: 
 5526: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Read"
 5527: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5528: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, 0 );
 5529: #endif
 5530: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5531: 
 5532: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read(	board_id,
 5533: 										rx_object_size,
 5534: 										0,		
 5535: 										NULL,	
 5536: 										rx_object_count,
 5537: 										rx_buffer
 5538: 									);
 5539: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code )  goto SPI_Data_Read_Error_Exit;;
 5540: 
 5541: 	if ( NULL != fd_log )
 5542: 	{
 5543: 		error_code = fwrite( rx_buffer, rx_object_size, rx_object_count, fd_log );
 5544: 	}
 5545: 	if ( error_code < 0 ) goto SPI_Data_Read_Error_Exit;
 5546: 
 5547: 	return SUCCESS;
 5548: 
 5549: SPI_Data_Read_Error_Exit:
 5550: 
 5551: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "SPI_Data_Read"
 5552: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_SPI_LOGGING == 1 )
 5553: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_SPI, board_id, error_code );
 5554: #endif
 5555: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5556: 
 5557: 	return error_code;
 5558: }
 5559: 
 5560: 
 5561: 
 5562: 
 5563: 
 5564: 
 5565: 
 5566: 
 5567: 
 5568: 
 5569: 
 5570: 
 5571: 
 5576: enum { FRAM_DENSITY_BYTES = 8192 };
 5577: 
 5578: 
 5579: 
 5588: static int FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( int board_id )
 5589: {
 5590: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
 5591: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 5592: 
 5593: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override"
 5594: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5595: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5596: #endif
 5597: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5598: 	
 5599: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Get( board_id, &(dataset->fram_spi_cs_route_backup) );
 5600: 	
 5601: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Set( board_id, dataset->fram_cs_default );
 5602: 	return SUCCESS;
 5603: }
 5604: 
 5612: static int FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( int board_id )
 5613: {
 5614: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
 5615: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 5616: 
 5617: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore"
 5618: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5619: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5620: #endif
 5621: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5622: 	
 5623: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Route_Set( board_id, dataset->fram_spi_cs_route_backup );
 5624: 	return SUCCESS;
 5625: }
 5626: 
 5634: int FRAM__Write_Enable_Latch_Set( int board_id )
 5635: {
 5636: 	int error_code;
 5637: 	uint8_t tx_buf[1] = { 0x06 }; 
 5638: 
 5639: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Write_Enable_Latch_Set"
 5640: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5641: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5642: #endif
 5643: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5644: 
 5645: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5646: 	
 5647: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_BUFFER );
 5648: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 1, 1, tx_buf, 0, NULL );
 5649: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5650: 	return error_code;
 5651: }
 5652: 
 5660: int FRAM__Write_Disable( int board_id )
 5661: {
 5662: 	int error_code;
 5663: 	uint8_t tx_buf[1] = { 0x04 }; 
 5664: 
 5665: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Write_Disable"
 5666: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5667: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5668: #endif
 5669: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5670: 
 5671: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5672: 	
 5673: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_BUFFER );
 5674: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 1, 1, tx_buf, 0, NULL );
 5675: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5676: 	return error_code;
 5677: }
 5678: 
 5687: int FRAM__Read_Status_Register( int board_id, uint8_t * status )
 5688: {
 5689: 	int 	error_code;
 5690: 	uint8_t tx_buf[2] = { 0x05, 0x00 }; 
 5691: 	uint8_t rx_buf[2];
 5692: 
 5693: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Read_Status_Register"
 5694: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5695: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5696: #endif
 5697: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5698: 
 5699: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5700: 	
 5701: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_BUFFER );
 5702: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 2, 1, tx_buf, 1, rx_buf );
 5703: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5704: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
 5705: 	*status = rx_buf[1];
 5706: 
 5707: #if defined( IDI_FRAM_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5708: {
 5709: 	int index;
 5710: 	printf( "FRAM__Read_Status_Register:" );
 5711: 	for ( index = 0; index < 2; index++ )
 5712: 	{
 5713: 		printf( " 0x%02X", rx_buf[index] );
 5714: 	}
 5715: 	printf( "\n" );
 5716: }
 5717: #endif
 5718: 	return SUCCESS;
 5719: }
 5720: 
 5729: int FRAM__Write_Status_Register( int board_id, uint8_t status )
 5730: {
 5731: 	int 	error_code;
 5732: 	uint8_t tx_buf[2] = { 0x01, 0x00 }; 
 5733: 	uint8_t rx_buf[2];
 5734: 
 5735: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Write_Status_Register"
 5736: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5737: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5738: #endif
 5739: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5740: 
 5741: 	FRAM__Write_Enable_Latch_Set( board_id );
 5742: 
 5743: 	tx_buf[1] = status;
 5744: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5745: 	
 5746: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_BUFFER );
 5747: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 2, 1, tx_buf, 1, rx_buf );
 5748: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5749: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
 5750: 
 5751: 	return SUCCESS;
 5752: }
 5753: 
 5764: int FRAM__Memory_Read( int board_id, uint16_t address, size_t count, uint8_t * buffer )
 5765: {
 5766: 	int 			error_code;
 5767: 
 5768: 	uint8_t 		tx_buf[3] = { 0x03, 0x00, 0x00 }; 
 5769: 	
 5770: 
 5771: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Memory_Read"
 5772: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5773: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5774: #endif
 5775: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5776: 
 5777: 
 5778: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5779: 	printf( "*** FRAM__Memory_Read:  Entry.\n" );
 5780: #endif
 5781: 
 5782: 	tx_buf[1] = (uint8_t)( address >>   8 );
 5783: 	tx_buf[2] = (uint8_t)( address & 0xFF ); 
 5784: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5785: 
 5786: 
 5787: 
 5788: 	
 5789: 	error_code = SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_SOFTWARE );
 5790: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Read_Error_Exit;
 5791: 
 5792: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0xFF );
 5793: 
 5794: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5795: 	printf( "*** FRAM__Memory_Read:  Send FRAM Write Command.\n" );
 5796: #endif
 5797: 
 5798: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 3, sizeof( uint8_t ), tx_buf, 0, NULL );
 5799: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Read_Error_Exit;
 5800: 
 5801: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5802: 	printf( "*** FRAM__Memory_Read:  count=%u\n", count );
 5803: #endif
 5804: 
 5805: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, sizeof( uint8_t ), 0, NULL, count, buffer );
 5806: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Read_Error_Exit;
 5807: 
 5808: 
 5809: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0x00 );
 5810: 
 5811: 
 5812: 
 5813: 
 5814: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5815: 	return SUCCESS;
 5816: 
 5817: FRAM__Memory_Read_Error_Exit:
 5818: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0x00 );
 5819: 
 5820: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Memory_Read"
 5821: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5822: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, error_code );
 5823: #endif
 5824: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5825: 
 5826: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5827: 	return error_code;
 5828: }
 5829: 
 5840: int FRAM__Memory_Write( int board_id, uint16_t address, size_t count, uint8_t * buffer )
 5841: {
 5842: 	int 			error_code;
 5843: 
 5844: 	uint8_t 		tx_buf[3] = { 0x02, 0x00, 0x00 }; 
 5845: 
 5846: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Memory_Write"
 5847: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5848: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5849: #endif
 5850: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5851: 
 5852: 	tx_buf[1] = (uint8_t)( address >>   8 );
 5853: 	tx_buf[2] = (uint8_t)( address & 0xFF ); 
 5854: 
 5855: 	FRAM__Write_Enable_Latch_Set( board_id );
 5856: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5857: 
 5858: 
 5859: 
 5860: 	
 5861: 	error_code = SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_SOFTWARE );
 5862: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Write_Error_Exit;
 5863: 
 5864: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0xFF );
 5865: 
 5866: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 3, sizeof( uint8_t ), tx_buf, 0, NULL );
 5867: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Write_Error_Exit;
 5868: 
 5869: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, sizeof( uint8_t ), count, buffer, 0, NULL );
 5870: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Memory_Write_Error_Exit;
 5871: 
 5872: 
 5873: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0x00 );
 5874: 
 5875: 
 5876: 
 5877: 
 5878: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5879: 	return SUCCESS;
 5880: 
 5881: FRAM__Memory_Write_Error_Exit:
 5882: 	SPI_Commit( board_id, 0x00 );
 5883: 
 5884: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Memory_Write"
 5885: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5886: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, error_code );
 5887: #endif
 5888: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5889: 
 5890: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5891: 	return error_code;
 5892: }
 5893: 
 5902: int FRAM__Read_ID( int board_id, uint32_t * id )
 5903: {
 5904: 	int 		error_code;
 5905: 	uint8_t 	tx_buf[5] = { 0x9F, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 }; 
 5906: 	uint8_t 	rx_buf[5];
 5907: 
 5908: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Read_ID"
 5909: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5910: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5911: #endif
 5912: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5913: 
 5914: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Override( board_id );
 5915: 	SPI_Configuration_Chip_Select_Behavior_Set( board_id, CSB_BUFFER );
 5916: 	error_code = SPI_Data_Write_Read( board_id, 5, 1, tx_buf, 1, rx_buf );
 5917: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM__Read_ID_Error_Exit;
 5918: 
 5919: 	{
 5920: 		uint32_t id_scratch = 0;
 5921: 		size_t	 index;
 5922: 
 5923: 		for ( index = 1; index < 5; index++ )
 5924: 		{ 
 5925: 			id_scratch = ( id_scratch << 8 ) | ( (uint32_t) rx_buf[index] );
 5926: 		}
 5927: 		*id = id_scratch;
 5928: 	}
 5929: #if defined( IDI_FRAM_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5930: {
 5931: 	int index;
 5932: 	printf( "FRAM__Read_ID:" );
 5933: 	for ( index = 0; index < 5; index++ )
 5934: 	{ 
 5941: 		printf( " 0x%02X", rx_buf[index] );
 5942: 	}
 5943: 	printf( "\n" );
 5944: }
 5945: #endif
 5946: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5947: 	return SUCCESS;
 5948: FRAM__Read_ID_Error_Exit:
 5949: 
 5950: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM__Read_ID"
 5951: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5952: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, error_code );
 5953: #endif
 5954: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5955: 
 5956: 	FRAM__Chip_Select_Route_Restore( board_id );
 5957: 	return error_code;
 5958: }
 5959: 
 5970: 
 5981: int FRAM_Set( int board_id, size_t count, uint8_t * buffer )
 5982: {
 5983: 	int			error_code;
 5984: 	size_t		block_count;
 5985: 	size_t		block_remainder;
 5986: 	uint16_t	address;
 5987: #if defined( IDI_FRAM_PRINT_DEBUG )
 5988: 	size_t		index;
 5989: #endif
 5990: 
 5991: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 5992: 
 5993: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM_Set"
 5994: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 5995: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 5996: #endif
 5997: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 5998: 
 5999: 
 6000: 
 6001: 
 6002: 	address = 0;
 6003: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
 6004: 
 6005: 	if ( count > 1 )
 6006: 	{ 
 6007: 		block_count     = ((size_t) FRAM_DENSITY_BYTES) / count;
 6008: 		block_remainder = ((size_t) FRAM_DENSITY_BYTES) - ( block_count * count );
 6009: 	}
 6010: 	else
 6011: 	{ 
 6012: 		int			index;
 6013: 		const int	block_size = FRAM_BLOCK_SIZE;
 6014: 		
 6015: 		if ( NULL == buffer )
 6016: 		{
 6017: 			for ( index = 0; index < block_size; index++ ) dataset->spi.fram_block[index]= 0;
 6018: 		}
 6019: 		else
 6020: 		{
 6021: 			for ( index = 0; index < block_size; index++ ) dataset->spi.fram_block[index]= buffer[0];
 6022: 		}
 6023: 		block_count     = ((size_t) FRAM_DENSITY_BYTES) / block_size;
 6024: 		block_remainder = ((size_t) FRAM_DENSITY_BYTES) - ( block_count * block_size );
 6025: 		buffer          = dataset->spi.fram_block;
 6026: 		count           = block_size;
 6027: 	}
 6028: 
 6029: #if defined( IDI_FRAM_PRINT_DEBUG )
 6030: 	index = 0;
 6031: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 6032:    printf( "FRAM_Set: count=%d, block_count=%d, block_remainder=%d\n", count, block_count, block_remainder );
 6033: # else
 6034:    printf( "FRAM_Set: count=%lu, block_count=%lu, block_remainder=%lu\n", count, block_count, block_remainder );
 6035: # endif
 6036: #endif
 6037: 
 6038: 	while ( block_count > 0 )
 6039: 	{
 6040: 		error_code = FRAM__Memory_Write( board_id, address, count, buffer );
 6041: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Set_Error_Exit;
 6042: 		address += (uint16_t) count;
 6043: 		block_count--;
 6044: 
 6045: #if defined( IDI_FRAM_PRINT_DEBUG )
 6046: 	if ( index < 16 )
 6047: 	{
 6048: # if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 6049: 		printf( "FRAM_Set: block_count=%d, address=%d\n", block_count, address );
 6050: # else
 6051: 		printf( "FRAM_Set: block_count=%lu, block_remainder=%d\n", block_count, address );
 6052: # endif
 6053: 		index++;
 6054: 	}
 6055: #endif
 6056: 
 6057: 	}
 6058: 
 6059: 	if ( block_remainder > 0 )
 6060: 	{
 6061: 		error_code = FRAM__Memory_Write( board_id, address, block_remainder, buffer );
 6062: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Set_Error_Exit;
 6063: 	}
 6064: 
 6065: 
 6066: 	return SUCCESS;
 6067: 
 6068: FRAM_Set_Error_Exit:
 6069: 
 6070: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM_Set"
 6071: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 6072: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, error_code );
 6073: #endif
 6074: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 6075: 
 6076: 	return error_code;
 6077: }
 6078: 
 6084: int FRAM_Report( int board_id, uint16_t address, size_t length, FILE * out )
 6085: {
 6086: 	int			error_code;
 6087: 	const int	block_size = HEX_DUMP_BYTES_PER_LINE;
 6088: 	size_t		block_count;
 6089: 	size_t		block_remainder;
 6090: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 6091: 
 6092: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM_Report"
 6093: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 6094: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, 0 );
 6095: #endif
 6096: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 6097: 
 6098: #if defined( SPI_PRINT_XFR_DEBUG )
 6099: 	fprintf( out, "FRAM using SPI CS channel %d\n", dataset->fram_cs_default ? 1 : 0 );
 6100: #endif
 6101: 
 6102: 	block_count = ((size_t) length) / block_size;
 6103: 	block_remainder = ((size_t) length) - ( block_count * block_size );
 6104: 
 6105: 	while ( block_count > 0 )
 6106: 	{ 
 6107: 		error_code = FRAM__Memory_Read( board_id, address, block_size, dataset->spi.fram_block );
 6108: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Report_Error_Exit;
 6109: 		error_code = Hex_Dump_Line( address, block_size, dataset->spi.fram_block, out );
 6110: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Report_Error_Exit;
 6111: 		address += block_size;
 6112: 		block_count--;
 6113: 	}
 6114: 
 6115: 	if ( block_remainder > 0 )
 6116: 	{ 
 6117: 		error_code = FRAM__Memory_Read( board_id, address, block_remainder, dataset->spi.fram_block );
 6118: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Report_Error_Exit;
 6119: 		error_code = Hex_Dump_Line( address, block_remainder, dataset->spi.fram_block, out );
 6120: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto FRAM_Report_Error_Exit;
 6121: 	}
 6122: 
 6123: 	return SUCCESS;
 6124: 
 6125: FRAM_Report_Error_Exit:
 6126: 
 6127: #define FUNCTION_NAME__  "FRAM_Report"
 6128: #if ( IO_TRACE_USE_FRAM_LOGGING == 1 )
 6129: 	IO_Trace_Log_Function( FUNCTION_NAME__, __LINE__, IO_TRACE_FRAM, board_id, error_code );
 6130: #endif
 6131: #undef FUNCTION_NAME__
 6132: 
 6133: 	return error_code;
 6134: }
 6135: 
 6141: int FRAM_Memory_To_File( int board_id, uint16_t address, size_t length, FILE * binary )
 6142: {
 6143: 	int			error_code;
 6144: 	size_t		block_count;
