 8939: 	if ( argc > 1 )
 8940: 	{
 8941: 		if ( 0 == strcmpi( "time", argv[1] ) )
 8942: 		{
 8943: 			if      ( argc > 2 )
 8944: 			{
 8945: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 8946: 				delay_normal_ms = (size_t) strtol( argv[2], NULL, 0 );
 8947: #endif
 8948: 			}
 8949: 			else if ( argc > 3 )
 8950: 			{
 8951: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 8952: 				delay_inverted_ms = (size_t) strtol( argv[3], NULL, 0 );
 8953: #endif
 8954: 			}
 8955: 		}
 8956: 	}
 8957: 
 8958: 	
 8959: 	for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 8960: 	{
 8961: 		IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, 0x00 );
 8962: 		dog[group] = 0x00;
 8963: 	}
 8964: 
 8965: 	state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
 8966: 	printf( "IDO48 Alternating sequence testing (press any key to quit):" );
 8967: 	while ( TEST_STATE_ACTIVE == state )
 8968: 	{   
 8969: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 8970: 		{
 8971: 			IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, pattern );
 8972: 			dog[group] = pattern;
 8973: 		}
 8974: 		
 8975: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 8976: 		{
 8977: 			IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dog[group]) );
 8978: 		}
 8979: 		Print_Byte_List( "DO:",				
 8980: 						 1,					
 8981: 						 mode_string,		
 8982: 						 IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY,	
 8983: 						 dog,				
 8984: 						 stdout				
 8985: 					   );
 8986: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 8987: 		delay( delay_normal_ms );
 8988: #endif
 8989: 		
 8990: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 8991: 		{
 8992: 			IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, ~pattern );
 8993: 			dog[group] = ~pattern;
 8994: 		}
 8995: 		
 8996: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 8997: 		{
 8998: 			IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dog[group]) );
 8999: 		}
 9000: 		Print_Byte_List( "DO:",				
 9001: 						 1,					
 9002: 						 mode_string,		
 9003: 						 IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY,	
 9004: 						 dog,				
 9005: 						 stdout				
 9006: 					   );
 9007: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9008: 		delay( delay_inverted_ms );
 9009: #endif
 9010: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) ) state = TEST_STATE_QUIT_USER;
 9011: 	}
 9012: 
 9013: 	
 9014: 	for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9015: 	{
 9016: 		IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, 0x00  );
 9017: 	}
 9018: 	return SUCCESS;
 9019: }
 9020: 
 9024: static int CMD__IDO48_DOUT_Test_One_Hot( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9025: {
 9026: 	TEST_STATE_ENUM state;
 9027: 	size_t			group;
 9028: 	size_t			channel;
 9029: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9030: 	size_t			delay_on_ms;
 9031: 	size_t			delay_off_ms;
 9032: #endif
 9033: 	uint8_t			dog[IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY];
 9034: 	char *			mode_string[] = { "binary" };
 9035: 
 9036: 	state = TEST_STATE_INIT;
 9037: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9038: 	delay_on_ms  = 100;			
 9039: 	delay_off_ms =  20;			
 9040: #endif
 9041: 	if ( argc > 0 )
 9042: 	{
 9043: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9044: 		delay_on_ms = (size_t) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
 9045: #endif
 9046: 	}
 9047: 	else if ( argc > 1 )
 9048: 	{
 9049: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9050: 		delay_off_ms = (size_t) strtol( argv[1], NULL, 0 );
 9051: #endif
 9052: 	}
 9053: 
 9054: 	
 9055: 	for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9056: 	{
 9057: 		dog[group] = 0x00; 
 9058: 		IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, dog[group] );
 9059: 	}
 9060: 
 9061: 	state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
 9062: 	printf( "IDO48 One-hot sequence testing (press any key to quit):" );
 9063: 	channel = 0;
 9064: 	while ( TEST_STATE_ACTIVE == state )
 9065: 	{   
 9066: 		IDO_DO_Channel_Set( board_id, channel, true );
 9067: 		
 9068: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9069: 		{
 9070: 			IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dog[group]) );
 9071: 		}
 9072: 		Print_Byte_List( "DO:",				
 9073: 						 1,					
 9074: 						 mode_string,		
 9075: 						 IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY,	
 9076: 						 dog,				
 9077: 						 stdout				
 9078: 					   );
 9079: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9080: 		delay( delay_on_ms );
 9081: #endif
 9082: 		
 9083: 		IDO_DO_Channel_Set( board_id, channel, false );
 9084: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9085: 		delay( delay_off_ms );
 9086: #endif
 9087: 		
 9088: 		for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9089: 		{
 9090: 			IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dog[group]) );
 9091: 		}
 9092: 		Print_Byte_List( "DO:",				
 9093: 						 1,					
 9094: 						 mode_string,		
 9095: 						 IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY,	
 9096: 						 dog,				
 9097: 						 stdout				
 9098: 					   );
 9099: 
 9100: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) ) state = TEST_STATE_QUIT_USER;
 9101: 		channel++;
 9102: 		if ( channel >= IDO_DO_QTY ) channel = 0;
 9103: 	}
 9104: 
 9105: 	
 9106: 	for( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9107: 	{
 9108: 		IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, 0x00  );
 9109: 	}
 9110: 	return SUCCESS;
 9111: }
 9112: 
 9115: static struct command_line_board  cmd_ido48_test[] =
 9116: {
 9117: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDO48_DOUT_Test_One_Hot,		"onehot",		"toggling one at a time forever"			},
 9118: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDO48_DOUT_Test_Alternate,		"alternate",	"alternate pattern at all ports forever"	},
 9119: #if ( IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY == IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY )
 9120: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDO48_IDI48_Loopback,			"loopback",		"IDI48 & IDO48 Loopback test"				},
 9121: #endif
 9122: 	{	NULL,	NULL,								NULL,			NULL										},
 9123: };
 9124: 
 9130: static int CMD__IDO48_Test( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9131: {
 9132: 	int 		error_code;
 9133: 	int 		index;
 9134:     int     	argc_new;
 9135:     char ** 	argv_new;
 9136:     char *      endptr;
 9137: 
 9138: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
 9139: 
 9140: 	error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
 9141: 
 9142: 	strtol( argv[0], &endptr, 0 ); 
 9143: 	if ( argv[0] != endptr )
 9144: 	{  
 9145: 		error_code = (* cmd_ido48_test[0].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc, argv );
 9146: 	}
 9147: 	else
 9148: 	{ 
 9149: 		index = 0;
 9150: 		while ( NULL != cmd_ido48_test[index].cmd_fnc )
 9151: 		{
 9152: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_ido48_test[index].name, argv[0] )  )
 9153: 			{
 9154: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
 9155: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
 9156: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
 9157: 				error_code = (* cmd_ido48_test[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
 9158: 				break;
 9159: 			}
 9160: 			index++;
 9161: 		}
 9162: 	}
 9163: 	return error_code;
 9164: }
 9165: 
 9171: static int CMD__IDO48_DO_ID( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9172: {
 9173: 	uint16_t 	id;
 9174: 	(void) 		argc;
 9175: 	(void) 		argv;
 9176: 	IDO_DOUT_ID_Get( board_id, &id );
 9177: 	printf( "IDO48 DOUT ID: 0x%04X\n", id );
 9178: 	return SUCCESS;
 9179: }
 9185: static int CMD__IDO48_DO_All( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9186: { 
 9187: 	int 	error_code;		       
 9188: 	size_t	group;
 9189: 	uint8_t do_grp[6];
 9190: 	
 9191: 
 9192: 	
 9193: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9194: 	{
 9195: 		error_code = IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(do_grp[group]) );
 9196: 	}
 9197: 	
 9198: 	Print_Byte_List( "DO:",				
 9199: 					 argc,				
 9200: 					 argv,				
 9201: 					 IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY,	
 9202: 					 do_grp,			
 9203: 					 stdout				
 9204: 				   );
 9205: 	return SUCCESS;
 9206: }
 9207: 
 9213: static int CMD__IDO48_DO_Channel( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9214: {
 9215: 	int 	error_code;		       
 9216: 	int 	channel;
 9217: 	char  	message[8];
 9218: 	BOOL	value;
 9219: 
 9220: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
 9221: 
 9222: 	channel = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
 9223: 
 9224: 	if ( argc < 2 )
 9225: 	{ 
 9226: 		error_code = IDO_DO_Channel_Get( board_id, channel, &value );
 9227: 		message[0] = value ? '1' : '0';
 9228: 		message[1] = '\0';
 9229: 		printf( "DO%02d: %s\n", channel, message );
 9230: 	}
 9231: 	else
 9232: 	{ 
 9233: 		value = String_To_Bool( argv[1] );
 9234: 		error_code = IDO_DO_Channel_Set( board_id, channel, value );
 9235: 	}
 9236: 	return SUCCESS;
 9237: }
 9238: 
 9244: static int CMD__IDO48_DO_Group( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9245: {
 9246: 	int 	error_code; 
 9247: 	int		group;
 9248: 	int		group_start;
 9249: 	int		group_end;
 9250: 	
 9251: 	BOOL	read_cycle;
 9252: 	uint8_t do_grp[IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY];
 9253: 
 9254: 
 9255: 	if ( argc < 1 )
 9256: 	{ 
 9257: 		group_start = 0;
 9258: 		group_end   = IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY - 1;
 9259: 		
 9260: 		read_cycle  = true;
 9261: 	}
 9262: 	else if ( argc > 1 )
 9263: 	{ 
 9264: 		group_start = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
 9265: 		if ( group_start >= IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY ) return -EC_CHANNEL;
 9266: 		group_end   = IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY - 1;
 9267: 		
 9268: 		read_cycle  = false; 
 9269: 	}
 9270: 	else
 9271: 	{ 
 9272: 		group_start = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
 9273: 		if ( group_start >= IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY ) return -EC_CHANNEL;
 9274: 		group_end   = group_start + 1;
 9275: 		
 9276: 		read_cycle  = true;
 9277: 	}
 9278: 
 9279: 	if ( true == read_cycle )
 9280: 	{ 
 9281: 		for ( group = group_start; group < group_end; group++ )
 9282: 		{
 9283: 			error_code = IDO_DO_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(do_grp[group]) );
 9284: 		}
 9285: 
 9286: 		printf( "DO_GROUP:" );
 9287: 		for ( group = group_start; group < group_end; group++ )
 9288: 		{
 9289: 			printf( " 0x%02X", ((int) do_grp[group]) );
 9290: 		}
 9291: 		printf( "\n" );
 9292: 	}
 9293: 	else
 9294: 	{ 
 9295: 		int index;
 9296: 		group_end = group_start;
 9297: 		group     = group_start;
 9298: 		for ( index = 1; index < argc; index++ )
 9299: 		{
 9300: 			do_grp[group] = (int) strtol( argv[index], NULL, 0 );
 9301: 			group++;
 9302: 			group_end++;
 9303: 			if ( group >= IDO_DO_GROUP_QTY ) break;
 9304: 		}
 9305: 
 9306: 		for ( group = group_start; group < group_end; group++ )
 9307: 		{
 9308: 			error_code = IDO_DO_Group_Set( board_id, group, do_grp[group] );
 9309: 		}
 9310: 	}
 9311: 	return SUCCESS;
 9312: }
 9313: 
 9316: static struct command_line_board  cmd_ido48[] =
 9317: {
 9318: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDO48_DO_ID,		"id",		"params: none.  Reports the DOUT board/component ID."	},
 9319: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDO48_DO_Channel,	"chan",		"params: <channel> <value>"								},
 9320: 	{   NULL,				CMD__IDO48_DO_Group,	"group",	"params: [<group_channel | all>]"						},
 9321: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDO48_DO_All,	 	"all",		"gets all digital outputs in binary and hex"			},
 9322: 	{   cmd_ido48_test,		CMD__IDO48_Test,		"test",		"semi-auto test functions"								},
 9323: 	{	NULL,				NULL,					NULL,		NULL													}
 9324: };
 9325: 
 9331: int Command_Line_IDO48( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
 9332: {
 9333: 	int 		error_code;
 9334: 	int 		index;
 9335:     int     	argc_new;
 9336:     char ** 	argv_new;
 9337:     char *      endptr;
 9338:     
 9339: 
 9340: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
 9341: 
 9342: 	if ( ID_IDO48 != board_id ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
 9343: 
 9344: 	error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
 9345: 
 9346: 	
 9347: 	strtol( argv[0], &endptr, 0 ); 
 9348: 	if ( argv[0] != endptr )
 9349: 	{  
 9350: 		error_code = (* cmd_ido48[0].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc, argv );
 9351: 	}
 9352: 	else
 9353: 	{ 
 9354: 		index = 0;
 9355: 		while ( NULL != cmd_ido48[index].cmd_fnc )
 9356: 		{
 9357: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_ido48[index].name, argv[0] )  )
 9358: 			{
 9359: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
 9360: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
 9361: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
 9362: 				error_code = (* cmd_ido48[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
 9363: 				break;
 9364: 			}
 9365: 			index++;
 9366: 		}
 9367: 	}
 9368: 	return error_code;
 9369: }
 9370: 
 9371: 
 9372: 
 9373: 
 9374: 
 9375: 
 9376: 
 9377: 
 9378: 
 9379: 
 9383: 
 9384: #define DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT 1
 9385: 
 9386: 
 9387: 
 9388: 
 9392: static BOOL CMD__IDI48_DIN_Helper_All_Values_False( uint8_t * dg, size_t group_qty )
 9393: {
 9394: 	size_t group;
 9395: 
 9396: 	for ( group = 0; group < group_qty; group++ )
 9397: 	{
 9398: 		if ( 0x00 != dg[group] ) return false;
 9399: 	}
 9400: 	return true; 
 9401: }
 9402: 
 9403: 
 9404: 
 9408: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Value( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9409: {
 9410: 	int 			error_code;
 9411: 	TEST_STATE_ENUM state;
 9412: 	size_t			group;
 9413: 	size_t			bit;
 9414: 	size_t			index;
 9415: 	uint8_t			result;
 9416: 	uint8_t			dig[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9417: 	uint8_t			dig_prev[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9418: 	uint8_t			group_change;
 9419: 	uint8_t			mask;
 9420: 	BOOL			din_cmplt[IDI_DIN_QTY];
 9421: 	FILE * 			out;
 9422: 	struct  idi_dataset *  dataset;
 9423: 	char * 			file_name;
 9424: 	char *			msg; 
 9425: 	char 			out_default[] = { "stdout" };
 9426: 	(void)			argc;
 9427: 	(void)  		argv;
 9428: 
 9429: 	state = TEST_STATE_INIT;
 9430: 
 9431: 	dataset = NULL;
 9432: 	switch( board_id )
 9433: 	{
 9434: 		case ID_IDI48:
 9435: 			dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 9436: 			break;
 9437: 		default:
 9438: 			return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
 9439: 	}
 9440: 
 9441: 
 9442: 	msg   = &(dataset->message[0]);
 9443: 
 9444: 	out       = stdout;
 9445: 	file_name = out_default;
 9446: 	if ( argc > 0 )
 9447: 	{
 9448: 		size_t  wi;		
 9449: 		char 	open_method[4];
 9450: 		wi = 0;
 9451: 		strcpy( open_method, "wt" );
 9452: 		if (  ( 0 == strcmpi( "--a",      argv[wi] ) )  ||
 9453: 			  ( 0 == strcmpi( "--append", argv[wi] ) )   )
 9454: 		{
 9455: 			wi++;
 9456: 			strcpy( open_method, "at" );
 9457: 		}
 9458: 
 9459: 		if ( argc > wi )
 9460: 		{
 9461: 			out = fopen( argv[wi], open_method );
 9462: 			file_name = argv[wi];
 9463: 		}
 9464: 	}
 9465: 
 9466: 	for( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9467: 	{
 9468: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9469: 		dig_prev[group] = dig[group];
 9470: 	}
 9471: 	for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) din_cmplt[bit] = false;
 9472: 
 9473: 	sprintf( msg, "DIN_TEST_VALUE:" );		Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9474: 	while ( ( TEST_STATE_QUIT != state ) && ( TEST_STATE_COMPLETE != state ) )
 9475: 	{ 
 9476: 		for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9477: 		switch( state )
 9478: 		{
 9479: 			case TEST_STATE_INIT: 
 9480: 				if ( true == CMD__IDI48_DIN_Helper_All_Values_False( dig, IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY ) )
 9481: 				{
 9482: 					state = TEST_STATE_READY;
 9483: 					sprintf( msg, "READY:" );	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9484: 				}
 9485: 				break;
 9486: 			case TEST_STATE_READY:
 9487: 				sprintf( msg, " " );	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9488: 				state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
 9489: 				break;
 9490: 			case TEST_STATE_ACTIVE:
 9491: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9492: 				{
 9493: 					group_change = dig[group] ^ dig_prev[group]; 
 9494: 					if ( 0x00 != group_change )
 9495: 					{
 9496: 						mask = 0x01;
 9497: 						for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE; bit++ )
 9498: 						{
 9499: 							index = bit + group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
 9500: 							if ( ( 0x00 != ( mask & group_change ) ) && ( false == din_cmplt[index] ) )
 9501: 							{
 9502: 								din_cmplt[index] = true;
 9503: 								sprintf( msg, "." );	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9504: 							}
 9505: 							mask = mask << 1;
 9506: 						}
 9507: 					}
 9508: 				}
 9509: 				result = true;
 9510: 				for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) result = result & din_cmplt[bit];
 9511: 				if ( true == result ) state = TEST_STATE_COMPLETE;
 9512: 				break;
 9513: 			case TEST_STATE_COMPLETE:
 9514: 				break;
 9515: 			case TEST_STATE_QUIT:
 9516: 				break;
 9517: 			default: 
 9518: 				break;
 9519: 		}
 9520: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) )
 9521: 		{
 9522: 			state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
 9523: 		}
 9524: 		for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) dig_prev[group] = dig[group];
 9525: 	}
 9526: 
 9527: 	{
 9528: 		char * msg = &(dataset->message[0]);
 9529: 		Time_Current_String( msg, MESSAGE_SIZE );	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9530: 		sprintf( msg, ": " );						Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9531: 	}
 9532: 
 9533: 	if ( TEST_STATE_QUIT == state )
 9534: 	{
 9535: 		sprintf( msg, "FAIL" );		error_code = EC_TEST_FAIL;
 9536: 	}
 9537: 	else
 9538: 	{
 9539: 		sprintf( msg, "PASS" );		error_code = SUCCESS;
 9540: 	}
 9541: 	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9542: 	sprintf( msg,  "\n" );
 9543: 	Print_Multiple( msg, out );
 9544: 	if ( out != stdout ) fclose( out );
 9545: 	return error_code;
 9546: }
 9547: 
 9551: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_RE( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9552: {
 9553: 	int 			error_code;
 9554: 	TEST_STATE_ENUM state;
 9555: 	size_t			group;
 9556: 	size_t			bit;
 9557: 	size_t			index;
 9558: 	uint8_t			result;
 9559: 	uint8_t			dig[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9560: 	uint8_t			pending[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9561: 	uint8_t			mask;
 9562: 	BOOL			din_cmplt[IDI_DIN_QTY];
 9563: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9564: 	char            message[64];
 9565: 	int				cp;
 9566: 	int				state_detect;
 9567: #endif
 9568: 	(void)			argc;
 9569: 	(void)  		argv;
 9570: 
 9571: 	state = TEST_STATE_INIT;
 9572: 
 9573: 	for( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9574: 	{
 9575: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9576: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_EDGE_GROUP0  + group,  0xFF ); 
 9577: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group,  0xFF ); 
 9578: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) );
 9579: 	}
 9580: 	for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) din_cmplt[bit] = false;
 9581: 
 9582: 	printf( "DIN_TEST_RISING_EDGE:" );
 9583: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9584: 	{
 9585: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) ); 
 9586: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9587: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0xFF ); 
 9588: 	}
 9589: 	while ( ( TEST_STATE_QUIT != state ) && ( TEST_STATE_COMPLETE != state ) )
 9590: 	{ 
 9591: 		switch( state )
 9592: 		{
 9593: 			case TEST_STATE_INIT: 
 9594: 				IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9595: 				if ( true == CMD__IDI48_DIN_Helper_All_Values_False( dig, IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY ) )
 9596: 				{
 9597: 					state = TEST_STATE_READY;
 9598: 					printf( " READY" );
 9599: 				}
 9600: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group, 0xFF );
 9601: 				break;
 9602: 			case TEST_STATE_READY:
 9603: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9604: 				cp = 0;
 9605: 				strcpy( message, "" );
 9606: 				state_detect = 2;
 9607: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9608: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9609: 				{
 9610: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9611: 				}
 9612: #else
 9613: 				printf( " " );
 9614: #endif
 9615: 				state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
 9616: 				break;
 9617: 			case TEST_STATE_ACTIVE:
 9618: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9619: 				{
 9620: 					if ( 0x00 != pending[group] )
 9621: 					{ 
 9622: 						mask = 0x01;
 9623: 						for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE; bit++ )
 9624: 						{
 9625: 							index = bit + group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
 9626: 							if ( ( 0x00 != (mask & pending[group]) ) && ( 0x00 != (dig[group] & mask) ) )
 9627: 							{ 
 9628: 								if ( false == din_cmplt[index] )
 9629: 								{
 9630: 									din_cmplt[index] = true;
 9631: 									
 9632: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9633: cp += sprintf( &(message[cp]), " [%2d]", (int) index );
 9634: state_detect = 1;
 9635: #else
 9636: 									printf( "." );
 9637: #endif
 9638: 								}
 9639: 							}
 9640: 							mask = mask << 1;
 9641: 						}
 9642: 						IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group,  0xFF ); 
 9643: 					}
 9644: 				}
 9645: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9646: if ( state_detect < 3 )
 9647: {
 9648: 	printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9649: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9650: 	{
 9651: 		printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9652: 	}
 9653: 	printf( "   " );
 9654: 	printf( "%s", message );
 9655: 	cp = 0;
 9656: 	state_detect++; 
 9657: }
 9658: strcpy( message, "" );
 9659: #endif
 9660: 				result = true;
 9661: 				for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) result = result & din_cmplt[bit];
 9662: 				if ( true == result ) state = TEST_STATE_COMPLETE;
 9663: 				
 9664: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9665: 				{
 9666: 					IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) ); 
 9667: 					IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9668: 				}
 9669: 				break;
 9670: 			case TEST_STATE_COMPLETE:
 9671: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9672: 				strcpy( message, "" );
 9673: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9674: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9675: 				{
 9676: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9677: 				}
 9678: 				printf( "   " );
 9679: 				printf( "\n" );
 9680: #endif
 9681: 				break;
 9682: 			case TEST_STATE_QUIT:
 9683: 				break;
 9684: 			default: 
 9685: 				break;
 9686: 		}
 9687: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) )
 9688: 		{
 9689: 			state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
 9690: 		}
 9691: 	}
 9692: 
 9693: 	
 9694: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9695: 	{
 9696: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0x00 );
 9697: 	}
 9698: 
 9699: 	if ( TEST_STATE_QUIT == state )
 9700: 	{
 9701: 		printf( " FAIL" );		error_code = EC_TEST_FAIL;
 9702: 	}
 9703: 	else
 9704: 	{
 9705: 		printf( " PASS" );		error_code = SUCCESS;
 9706: 	}
 9707: 
 9708: 	printf( "\n" );
 9709: 
 9710: 	return error_code;
 9711: }
 9712: 
 9716: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_FE( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9717: {
 9718: 	int 			error_code;
 9719: 	TEST_STATE_ENUM state;
 9720: 	size_t			group;
 9721: 	size_t			bit;
 9722: 	size_t			index;
 9723: 	uint8_t			result;
 9724: 	uint8_t			dig[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9725: 	uint8_t			pending[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9726: 	uint8_t			mask;
 9727: 	BOOL			din_cmplt[IDI_DIN_QTY];
 9728: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9729: 	char            message[64];
 9730: 	int				cp;
 9731: 	int				state_detect;
 9732: #endif
 9733: 	(void)			argc;
 9734: 	(void)  		argv;
 9735: 
 9736: 	state = TEST_STATE_INIT;
 9737: 
 9738: 	for( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9739: 	{
 9740: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9741: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_EDGE_GROUP0  + group,  0x00 ); 
 9742: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group,  0xFF ); 
 9743: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) );
 9744: 	}
 9745: 	for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) din_cmplt[bit] = false;
 9746: 
 9747: 	printf( "DIN_TEST_FALLING_EDGE:" );
 9748: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9749: 	{
 9750: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) ); 
 9751: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9752: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0xFF ); 
 9753: 	}
 9754: 	while ( ( TEST_STATE_QUIT != state ) && ( TEST_STATE_COMPLETE != state ) )
 9755: 	{ 
 9756: 		switch( state )
 9757: 		{
 9758: 			case TEST_STATE_INIT: 
 9759: 				IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9760: 				if ( true == CMD__IDI48_DIN_Helper_All_Values_False( dig, IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY ) )
 9761: 				{
 9762: 					state = TEST_STATE_READY;
 9763: 					printf( " READY" );
 9764: 				}
 9765: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group, 0xFF );
 9766: 				break;
 9767: 			case TEST_STATE_READY:
 9768: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9769: 				cp = 0;
 9770: 				strcpy( message, "" );
 9771: 				state_detect = 2;
 9772: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9773: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9774: 				{
 9775: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9776: 				}
 9777: #else
 9778: 				printf( " " );
 9779: #endif
 9780: 				state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
 9781: 				break;
 9782: 			case TEST_STATE_ACTIVE:
 9783: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9784: 				{
 9785: 					if ( 0x00 != pending[group] )
 9786: 					{ 
 9787: 						mask = 0x01;
 9788: 						for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE; bit++ )
 9789: 						{
 9790: 							index = bit + group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
 9791: 							if ( ( 0x00 != (mask & pending[group]) ) && ( 0x00 == (dig[group] & mask) ) )
 9792: 							{ 
 9793: 								if ( false == din_cmplt[index] )
 9794: 								{
 9795: 									din_cmplt[index] = true;
 9796: 									
 9797: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9798: cp += sprintf( &(message[cp]), " [%2d]", (int) index );
 9799: state_detect = 1;
 9800: #else
 9801: 									printf( "." );
 9802: #endif
 9803: 								}
 9804: 							}
 9805: 							mask = mask << 1;
 9806: 						}
 9807: 						IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group,  0xFF ); 
 9808: 					}
 9809: 				}
 9810: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9811: if ( state_detect < 3 )
 9812: {
 9813: 	printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9814: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9815: 	{
 9816: 		printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9817: 	}
 9818: 	printf( "   " );
 9819: 	printf( "%s", message );
 9820: 	cp = 0;
 9821: 	state_detect++; 
 9822: }
 9823: strcpy( message, "" );
 9824: #endif
 9825: 				result = true;
 9826: 				for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) result = result & din_cmplt[bit];
 9827: 				if ( true == result ) state = TEST_STATE_COMPLETE;
 9828: 				
 9829: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9830: 				{
 9831: 					IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) ); 
 9832: 					IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
 9833: 				}
 9834: 				break;
 9835: 			case TEST_STATE_COMPLETE:
 9836: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9837: 				strcpy( message, "" );
 9838: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
 9839: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9840: 				{
 9841: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
 9842: 				}
 9843: 				printf( "   " );
 9844: 				printf( "\n" );
 9845: #endif
 9846: 				break;
 9847: 			case TEST_STATE_QUIT:
 9848: 				break;
 9849: 			default: 
 9850: 				break;
 9851: 		}
 9852: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) )
 9853: 		{
 9854: 			state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
 9855: 		}
 9856: 	}
 9857: 
 9858: 	
 9859: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9860: 	{
 9861: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0x00 );
 9862: 	}
 9863: 
 9864: 	if ( TEST_STATE_QUIT == state )
 9865: 	{
 9866: 		printf( " FAIL" );		error_code = EC_TEST_FAIL;
 9867: 	}
 9868: 	else
 9869: 	{
 9870: 		printf( " PASS" );		error_code = SUCCESS;
 9871: 	}
 9872: 
 9873: 	printf( "\n" );
 9874: 
 9875: 	return error_code;
 9876: }
 9877: 
 9878: 
 9879: 
 9880: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9881: 
 9889: static irqreturn_t CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Handler( int irq, void * dev_id, struct pt_regs * regs )
 9890: {
 9891: 	size_t	group;
 9892: 	uint8_t	interrupt_status;
 9893: 	uint8_t	mask_group;
 9894: 	uint8_t pending;
 9895: 	uint8_t bank_backup;
 9896: 	uint8_t bank_previous_backup;
 9897: 	int		board_id;
 9898: 	struct  idi_dataset *  idi_dataset;
 9899: 	(void)	irq;
 9900: 	(void)	dev_id;
 9901: 	(void)	regs;
 9902: 
 9903: 	board_id = *((int *) dev_id);
 9904: 	switch( board_id )
 9905: 	{
 9906: 		case ID_IDI48:
 9907: 			idi_dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 9908: 			break;
 9909: 		default: 
 9910: 			goto CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Handler_Completed;
 9911: 	}
 9912: 
 9913: 	
 9914: 	bank_previous_backup = idi_dataset->bank_previous;
 9915: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_BANK,          &bank_backup      );
 9916: 	
 9917: 	IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BY_GROUP, &interrupt_status );
 9918: 	mask_group = 0x01;
 9919: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
 9920: 	{ 
 9921: 		if ( 0 != ( mask_group & interrupt_status ) )
 9922: 		{
 9923: 			IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &pending );
 9924: 			idi_dataset->isr_pending_list[group] = pending;
 9925: 			IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group, pending );
 9926: 		}
 9927: 		else
 9928: 		{
 9929: 			idi_dataset->isr_pending_list[group] = 0;
 9930: 		}
 9931: 		mask_group = mask_group << 1;
 9932: 	}
 9933: 	
 9934: 	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_BANK, bank_backup );
 9935: 	idi_dataset->bank_previous = bank_previous_backup;
 9936: CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Handler_Completed:
 9937: 	idi_dataset->irq_count++;
 9938: 	return IRQ_HANDLED;
 9939: }
 9940: #endif
 9941: 
 9942: 
 9948: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
 9949: {
 9950: 	struct idi_dataset *  idi_dataset;
 9951: 	
 9952: 	int 				error_code;
 9953: 	TEST_STATE_ENUM 	state;
 9954: 	size_t				group;
 9955: 	size_t				bit;
 9956: 	size_t				index;
 9957: 	size_t				irq_count_local;
 9958: 	uint8_t				result;
 9959: 	uint8_t				irq_pending_local;
 9960: 	uint8_t				dig[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9961: 	uint8_t				pending[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
 9962: 	uint8_t				mask;
 9963: 	BOOL				io_report_backup, io_simulate_backup;
 9964: 	BOOL				din_cmplt[IDI_DIN_QTY];
 9965: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
 9966: 	char            	message[64];
 9967: 	int					cp;
 9968: 	int					state_detect;
 9969: #endif
 9970: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
 9971: 	unsigned int    interrupt_number;
 9972: 	switch( board_id )
 9973: 	{
 9974: 		case ID_IDI48:
 9975: 			idi_dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 9976: 			break;
 9977: 		default:
 9978: 			return -EC_BOARD;
 9979: 	}
 9980: 
 9981: 	if ( argc > 0 )
 9982: 	{
 9983: 		interrupt_number = (unsigned int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
 9984: 	}
 9985: 	else
 9986: 	{
 9987: 		interrupt_number = idi_dataset->irq_number;
 9988: 	}
 9989: #else
 9990: 	
 9991: 	(void)			argc;
 9992: 	(void)  		argv;
 9993: 
 9994: 	switch( board_id )
 9995: 	{
 9996: 		case ID_IDI48:
 9997: 			idi_dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
 9998: 			break;
 9999: 		default:
10000: 			return -EC_BOARD;
10001: 	}
10002: #endif
10003: 
10004: 	IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_SPI_CONFIG, 0 );
10005: 	io_report_backup   = idi_dataset->io_report;
10006: 	io_simulate_backup = idi_dataset->io_simulate;
10007: 
10008: 	idi_dataset->irq_count_previous = 0;
10009: 	idi_dataset->irq_count          = 0;
10010: 
10011: 	state             = TEST_STATE_INIT;
10012: 	irq_pending_local = 0;
10013: 	irq_count_local   = 0;
10014: 
10015: 
10016: 	for( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10017: 	{
10018: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
10019: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_EDGE_GROUP0  + group,  0xFF ); 
10020: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group,  0xFF ); 
10021: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) );
10022: 	}
10023: 	for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) din_cmplt[bit] = false;
10024: 
10025: 	printf( "DIN_INTERRUPT:" );
10026: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10027: 	{
10028: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_PEND_GROUP0 + group, &(pending[group]) ); 
10029: 		IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
10030: 	}
10031: 
10032: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10033: 	
10034: 	error_code = IOKern_DOS_IRQ_Request( interrupt_number,                		
10035: 										 CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Handler,   
10036: 										 (void *) &board_id						
10037: 									   );
10038: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code )
10039: 	{
10040: 		state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
10041: 		goto CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Terminate;
10042: 	}
10043: #else
10044: 	state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
10045: 	error_code = -EC_INTERRUPT_UNAVAILABLE;
10046: 	goto CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Terminate;
10047: #endif
10048: 
10049: 	
10050: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10051: 	{
10052: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0xFF );
10053: 	}
10054: 
10055: 	idi_dataset->irq_handler_active = true;
10056: 
10057: 	while ( ( TEST_STATE_QUIT != state ) && ( TEST_STATE_COMPLETE != state ) )
10058: 	{ 
10059: 
10060: 		switch( state )
10061: 		{
10062: 			case TEST_STATE_INIT: 
10063: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10064: 				{
10065: 					IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(dig[group]) );
10066: 				}
10067: 				if ( true == CMD__IDI48_DIN_Helper_All_Values_False( dig, IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY ) )
10068: 				{
10069: 					state = TEST_STATE_READY;
10070: 					printf( " READY" );
10071: 				}
10072: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_CLEAR_GROUP0 + group, 0xFF );
10073: 				break;
10074: 			case TEST_STATE_READY:		
10075: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
10076: 				cp = 0;
10077: 				strcpy( message, "" );
10078: 				state_detect = 2;
10079: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
10080: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10081: 				{
10082: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
10083: 				}
10084: #else
10085: 				printf( " " );
10086: #endif
10087: 				state = TEST_STATE_ACTIVE;
10088: 				break;
10089: 			case TEST_STATE_ACTIVE:		
10090: 
10091: 				if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) ) state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
10092: 
10093: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10094: 				disable();  
10095: #endif
10096: 				irq_count_local = idi_dataset->irq_count;
10097: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10098: 				{
10099: 					pending[group] = idi_dataset->isr_pending_list[group];
10100: 					if ( 0 != pending[group] ) irq_pending_local++;
10101: 				}
10102: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10103: 				enable();
10104: #endif
10105: 
10106: 				if ( irq_count_local != idi_dataset->irq_count_previous )
10107: 				{
10108: 					if ( irq_count_local > idi_dataset->irq_count_previous )
10109: 					{
10110: 						index = irq_count_local - idi_dataset->irq_count_previous;
10111: 					}
10112: 					else
10113: 					{ 
10114: 						index = UINT_MAX - idi_dataset->irq_count_previous;
10115: 						index = index + irq_count_local + 1;
10116: 					}
10117: 					idi_dataset->irq_count_previous = irq_count_local;
10118: 					irq_count_local = index;
10119: 				}
10120: 				else
10121: 				{
10122: 					irq_count_local   = 0; 
10123: 					irq_pending_local = 0;
10124: 				}
10125: 
10126: 				if ( irq_count_local > 0 )
10127: 				{
10128: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
10129: cp += sprintf( &(message[cp]), " {%2d}", (int) irq_count_local );
10130: #endif
10131: 					for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10132: 					{
10133: 						if ( 0x00 != pending[group] )
10134: 						{ 
10135: 							mask = 0x01;
10136: 							for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE; bit++ )
10137: 							{
10138: 								index = bit + group * IDI_DIN_GROUP_SIZE;
10139: 								if ( 0x00 != (mask & pending[group]) )
10140: 								{ 
10141: 									if ( false == din_cmplt[index] )
10142: 									{
10143: 										din_cmplt[index] = true;
10144: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
10145: cp += sprintf( &(message[cp]), " [%2d]", (int) index );
10146: state_detect = 1;
10147: #else
10148: 										printf( "." );
10149: #endif
10150: 									}
10151: 								}
10152: 								mask = mask << 1;
10153: 							}
10154: 						}
10155: 					}
10156: 				}
10157: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
10158: if ( state_detect < 3 )
10159: {
10160: 	printf( "\nPENDING:" );
10161: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10162: 	{
10163: 		printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
10164: 	}
10165: 	printf( "   " );
10166: 	printf( "%s", message );
10167: 	cp = 0;
10168: 	state_detect++; 
10169: }
10170: strcpy( message, "" );
10171: #endif
10172: 				result = true;
10173: 				for ( bit = 0; bit < IDI_DIN_QTY; bit++ ) result = result & din_cmplt[bit];
10174: 				if ( true == result ) state = TEST_STATE_COMPLETE;
10175: 				break;
10176: 			case TEST_STATE_COMPLETE:		
10177: #if defined( DIN_TEST_DEBUG_PRINT )
10178: 				strcpy( message, "" );
10179: 				printf( "\nPENDING:" );
10180: 				for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10181: 				{
10182: 					printf( " 0x%02X", pending[group] );
10183: 				}
10184: 				printf( "   " );
10185: 				printf( "\n" );
10186: #endif
10187: 				break;
10188: 			case TEST_STATE_QUIT:		
10189: 				break;
10190: 			default: 
10191: 				break;
10192: 		}
10193: 		if ( true == Character_Get( NULL ) )
10194: 		{
10195: 			state = TEST_STATE_QUIT;
10196: 		}
10197: 	}
10198: 
10199: 	
10200: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10201: 	{
10202: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, IDI_INTR_BIT_GROUP0  + group,  0x00 );
10203: 	}
10204: 
10205: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10206: 	IOKern_DOS_IRQ_Free( idi_dataset->irq_number );
10207: 	idi_dataset->irq_handler_active = false;
10208: #endif
10209: 
10210: CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt_Terminate:
10211: 
10212: 	idi_dataset->io_report   = io_report_backup;
10213: 	idi_dataset->io_simulate = io_simulate_backup;
10214: 
10215: 	if ( TEST_STATE_QUIT == state )
10216: 	{
10217: 		printf( " FAIL" );		error_code = EC_TEST_FAIL;
10218: 	}
10219: 	else
10220: 	{
10221: 		printf( " PASS" );		error_code = SUCCESS;
10222: 	}
10223: 
10224: 	printf( "\n" );
10225: 
10226: 	return error_code;
10227: }
10228: 
10231: static struct command_line_board  cmd_idi48_test[] =
10232: {
10233: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Value,		"value",	"loop, until all have toggled"					},
10234: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_RE,			"re",		"loop, rising-edge detect  (led perspective)"	},
10235: 	{   NULL,	CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_FE,			"fe",		"loop, falling-edge detect (led perspective)"	},
10236: 	{	NULL,	CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test_Interrupt,	"interrupt","loop, test interrupt on all inputs"			},
10237: 	{	NULL,	NULL,							NULL,		NULL											},
10238: };
10239: 
10243: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10244: {
10245: 	int 		error_code;
10246: 	int 		index;
10247:     int     	argc_new;
10248:     char ** 	argv_new;
10249:     char *      endptr;
10250:     
10251: 
10252: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
10253: 
10254: 	error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
10255: 
10256: 	
10257: 	strtol( argv[0], &endptr, 0 ); 
10258: 	if ( argv[0] != endptr )
10259: 	{  
10260: 		error_code = (* cmd_idi48_test[0].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc, argv );
10261: 	}
10262: 	else
10263: 	{ 
10264: 		index = 0;
10265: 		while ( NULL != cmd_idi48_test[index].cmd_fnc )
10266: 		{
10267: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_idi48_test[index].name, argv[0] )  )
10268: 			{
10269: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
10270: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
10271: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
10272: 				error_code = (* cmd_idi48_test[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
10273: 				break;
10274: 			}
10275: 			index++;
10276: 		}
10277: 	}
10278: 	return error_code;
10279: }
10280: 
10281: 
10287: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_ID( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10288: { 
10289: 	uint16_t 	id;
10290: 	(void) 		argc;
10291: 	(void) 		argv;
10292: 	IDI_DIN_ID_Get( board_id, &id );
10293: 	printf( "IDI48 DIN ID: 0x%04X\n", id );
10294: 	return SUCCESS;
10295: }
10296: 
10302: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_All( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10303: { 
10304: 	int 	error_code;		       
10305: 	int 	channel;
10306: 	
10307: 	int		cp;
10308: 	enum { MODE_NONE = 0, MODE_BINARY = 1, MODE_HEX = 2, MODE_ALL = 3 } mode_out;
10309: 	int		group;
10310: 	char  	message[64];
10311: 	uint8_t din_grp[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
10312: 	uint8_t mask;
10313: 	(void)	argc;
10314: 	(void)	argv;
10315: 
10316: 	mode_out = MODE_ALL;
10317: 	if ( argc > 0 )
10318: 	{
10319: 		int index;
10320: 		mode_out = MODE_NONE;
10321: 		for ( index = 0; index < argc; index++ )
10322: 		{
10323: 			if      ( 0 == strcmpi( "binary", argv[index] ) ) mode_out |= MODE_BINARY;
10324: 			else if ( 0 == strcmpi( "group",  argv[index] ) ) mode_out |= MODE_HEX;
10325: 			else if ( 0 == strcmpi( "hex",    argv[index] ) ) mode_out |= MODE_HEX;
10326: 			else                                              mode_out |= MODE_ALL;
10327: 		}
10328: 	}
10329: 	
10330: 	cp    = 0;
10331: 	group = 0;
10332: 	for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10333: 	{
10334: 		error_code = IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(din_grp[group]) );
10335: 		mask = 0x01;
10336: 		for ( channel = 0; channel < 8; channel++ )
10337: 		{
10338: 			message[cp++] = !!(din_grp[group] & mask) ? '1' : '0';
10339: 			mask = mask << 1;
10340: 		}
10341: 		message[cp++] = ' ';
10342: 	}
10343: 	message[cp] = '\0';
10344: 	if ( MODE_BINARY == ( mode_out & MODE_BINARY ) )
10345: 	{
10346: 		printf( "DIN: %s\n", message );
10347: 	}
10348: 	if ( MODE_HEX == ( mode_out & MODE_HEX ) )
10349: 	{
10350: 		printf( "DIN:" );
10351: 		for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ ) printf( " %02X", din_grp[group] );
10352: 		printf( "\n" );
10353: 	}
10354: 
10355: 	return SUCCESS;
10356: }
10357: 
10363: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Channel( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10364: {
10365: 	int 	error_code;		       
10366: 	int 	channel;
10367: 	char  	message[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY + 2];
10368: 	BOOL	value;
10369: 
10370: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
10371: 
10372: 	channel = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
10373: 	error_code = IDI_DIN_Channel_Get( board_id, channel, &value );
10374: 	message[0] = value ? '1' : '0';
10375: 	message[1] = '\0';
10376: 
10377: 	printf( "DIN%02d: %s\n", channel, message );
10378: 	return SUCCESS;
10379: }
10380: 
10386: static int CMD__IDI48_DIN_Group( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10387: {
10388: 	int 	error_code; 
10389: 
10390: 	int 	group;
10391: 	int		group_count;
10392: 	BOOL	do_all;
10393: 	uint8_t din_grp[IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY];
10394: 
10395: 	if ( argc < 1 ) do_all = true;
10396: 	else            do_all = false;
10397: 
10398: 	if ( 0 == strcmpi( "all", argv[0] ) ) do_all = true;
10399: 
10400: 	if ( do_all )
10401: 	{ 
10402: 		for ( group = 0; group < IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY; group++ )
10403: 		{
10404: 			error_code = IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(din_grp[group]) );
10405: 		}
10406: 		group_count = IDI_DIN_GROUP_QTY;
10407: 	}
10408: 	else
10409: 	{
10410: 		group = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
10411: 		error_code = IDI_DIN_Group_Get( board_id, group, &(din_grp[0]) );
10412: 		group_count = 1;
10413: 	}
10414: 
10415: 	printf( "DIN_GROUP:" );
10416: 	for ( group = 0; group < group_count; group++ )
10417: 	{
10418: 		printf( " 0x%02X", ((int) din_grp[group]) );
10419: 	}
10420: 	printf( "\n" );
10421: 	return SUCCESS;
10422: }
10423: 
10427: static struct command_line_board  cmd_idi48[] =
10428: {
10429: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDI48_DIN_ID,		"id",		"params: none.  Reports the DIN board/component ID."	},
10430: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDI48_DIN_Channel,	"chan",		"params: <channel>"										},
10431: 	{   NULL,				CMD__IDI48_DIN_Group,	"group",	"params: [<group_channel | all>]"						},
10432: 	{	NULL,				CMD__IDI48_DIN_All,	 	"all",		"reports all digital inputs in binary and hex"			},
10433: 	{   cmd_idi48_test,		CMD__IDI48_DIN_Test,	"test",		"semi-auto test functions"								},
10434: 	{	NULL,				NULL,					NULL,		NULL													},
10435: };
10436: 
10442: int Command_Line_IDI48( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
10443: { 
10444: 	int 		error_code;
10445: 	int 		index;
10446:     int     	argc_new;
10447:     char ** 	argv_new;
10448:     char *      endptr;
10449:     
10450: 
10451: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
10452: 
10453: 	if ( ID_IDI48 != board_id ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
10454: 
10455: 	error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
10456: 
10457: 	
10458: 	strtol( argv[0], &endptr, 0 ); 
10459: 	if ( argv[0] != endptr )
10460: 	{  
10461: 		error_code = (* cmd_idi48[0].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc, argv );
10462: 	}
10463: 	else
10464: 	{ 
10465: 		index = 0;
10466: 		while ( NULL != cmd_idi48[index].cmd_fnc )
10467: 		{
10468: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_idi48[index].name, argv[0] )  )
10469: 			{
10470: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
10471: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
10472: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
10473: 				error_code = (* cmd_idi48[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
10474: 				break;
10475: 			}
10476: 			index++;
10477: 		}
10478: 	}
10479: 	return error_code;
10480: }
10481: 
10482: 
10483: 
10484: 
10485: 
10486: 
10487: 
10488: 
10489: 
10495: static int CMD__Trace_File( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10496: { 
10497: 	int 					error_code;
10498: 	size_t					index;
10499: 	BOOL					not_done;
10500: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10501: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10502: 
10503: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
10504: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10505: 	{ 
10506: 		printf( "file_name    = " );
10507: 		if ( 0 == strlen( dataset->trace.filename ) ) printf( "%s\n", IO_TRACE_DUMP_FILE_NAME );
10508: 		else                                          printf( "%s\n", dataset->trace.filename );
10509: 	}
10510: 	else
10511: 	{ 
10512: 		index    = 0;
10513: 		not_done = true;
10514: 		do
10515: 		{
10516: 			dataset->trace.filename[index] = argv[0][index];
10517: 			if ( '\0' == argv[0][index] )
10518: 			{
10519: 				not_done = false;
10520: 			}
10521: 			else if ( index >= ( IO_TRACE_FILE_NAME_SIZE - 2) )
10522: 			{
10523: 				not_done = false;
10524: 				index++;
10525: 				dataset->trace.filename[index] = '\0';
10526: 			}
10527: 			else
10528: 			{
10529: 				index++;
10530: 			}
10531: 		} while ( true == not_done );
10532: 	}
10533: 	return error_code;
10534: }
10535: 
10541: static int CMD__Trace_Stop( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10542: { 
10543: 	int 					error_code;
10544: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10545: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10546: 
10547: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
10548: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10549: 	{ 
10550: 		printf( "stop         = " );
10551: 		printf( "%s\n", global_io_trace_stop_name[dataset->trace.stop] );
10552: 
10561: 	}
10562: 	else
10563: 	{ 
10564: 		int index = 0;
10565: 		error_code = -EC_PARAMETER;
10566: 		while ( NULL != global_io_trace_stop_name[index] )
10567: 		{
10568: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( global_io_trace_stop_name[index], argv[0] )  )
10569: 			{
10570: 				dataset->trace.stop = (enum IO_TRACE_STOP_ENUM) index;
10571: 				error_code = SUCCESS;
10572: 				break;
10573: 			}
10574: 			index++;
10575: 		}
10576: 
10594: 	}
10595: 	return error_code;
10596: }
10597: 
10603: static int CMD__Trace_Start( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10604: { 
10605: 	int 					error_code;
10606: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10607: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10608: 
10609: 	error_code = SUCCESS;
10610: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10611: 	{ 
10612: 		printf( "start        = " );
10613: 		printf( "%s\n", global_io_trace_start_name[dataset->trace.start] );
10614: 
10623: 	}
10624: 	else
10625: 	{ 
10626: 		int index = 0;
10627: 		error_code = -EC_PARAMETER;
10628: 		while ( NULL != global_io_trace_start_name[index] )
10629: 		{
10630: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( global_io_trace_start_name[index], argv[0] )  )
10631: 			{
10632: 				dataset->trace.start = (enum IO_TRACE_START_ENUM) index;
10633: 				error_code = SUCCESS;
10634: 				break;
10635: 			}
10636: 			index++;
10637: 		}
10638: 
10656: 	}
10657: 	return error_code;
10658: }
10659: 
10663: static struct command_line_board  cmd_trace[] =
10664: {
10665: 	{	NULL,	CMD__Trace_Start,			"start",	"begin trace on: < "  IO_TRACE_START_DEFINITION( IO_TRACE_START_STOP_EXTRACT_NAME_HELP_LIST ) ">" },
10666: 	{	NULL,	CMD__Trace_Stop,			"stop",		"stop trace on:  < "  IO_TRACE_STOP_DEFINITION(  IO_TRACE_START_STOP_EXTRACT_NAME_HELP_LIST ) ">" },
10667: 	{	NULL,	CMD__Trace_File,			"file",		"file_name up to 32-characters"			},
10668: 	{	NULL,	NULL,						NULL,		NULL									},
10669: };
10670: 
10674: static int CMD__Main_Trace( int board_id,  int argc,  char* argv[] )
10675: {
10676: 	int 		error_code;
10677: 	int 		index;
10678:     int     	argc_new;
10679:     char ** 	argv_new;
10680:     (void)		board_id;
10681: 
10682:     error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
10683: 
10684: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10685: 	{
10686: 		index = 0;
10687: 		while ( NULL != cmd_trace[index].cmd_fnc )
10688: 		{
10689: 			printf( "trace." );
10690: 			argv_new = &(argv[1]);
10691: 			argc_new = argc - 1;
10692: 			if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
10693: 			error_code = (* cmd_trace[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
10694: 			index++;
10695: 		}
10696: 	}
10697: 	else
10698: 	{
10699: 		index = 0;
10700: 		while ( NULL != cmd_trace[index].cmd_fnc )
10701: 		{
10702: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_trace[index].name, argv[0] )  )
10703: 			{
10704: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
10705: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
10706: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
10707: 				error_code = (* cmd_trace[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
10708: 				break;
10709: 			}
10710: 			index++;
10711: 		}
10712: 	}
10713: 	return error_code;
10714: }
10715: 
10733: int Command_Line_Register_Transaction( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
10734: {
10735: 	int 					error_code;
10736: 	BOOL					valid_bank_reg;
10737: 	int 					index;
10738: 	struct reg_definition * definition;
10739: 	
10740: 
10741: 	definition = ( struct reg_definition * ) board_definition[board_id].definition;
10742: 	
10743: 
10744: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
10745: 
10746: 	error_code = Register_Acronym_To_Row( board_id, argv[0], &index );
10747: 	if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
10748: 
10749: 	
10754: 	valid_bank_reg = false;
10755: 	switch( board_id )
10756: 	{
10757: 		case ID_IDI48:  if ( IDI_BANK == definition[index].symbol )  valid_bank_reg = true;		break;
10758: 		case ID_IDO48:	if ( IDO_BANK == definition[index].symbol )  valid_bank_reg = true;		break;
10759: 	}
10760: 	if ( valid_bank_reg )
10761: 	{
10762: 		if ( argc < 2 )
10763: 		{ 
10764: 			uint8_t value;
10765: 			error_code = IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, definition[index].symbol, &value );
10766: 			if ( SUCCESS == error_code )
10767: 			{
10768: 				printf( "RD: %s=%s  (0x%02X)\n",  definition[index].acronym, Bank_Symbol_To_Name( board_id, ((int) value) ), value );
10769: 			}
10770: 		}
10771: 		else
10772: 		{ 
10773: 			uint8_t 	value;
10774: 			int		 	bank;
10775: 
10776: 			error_code = Bank_Name_To_Symbol( board_id, argv[1], &bank );
10777: 			if ( SUCCESS != error_code )
10778: 			{ 
10779: 				value = (uint8_t) strtol( argv[1], NULL, 0 );
10780: 			}
10781: 			else
10782: 			{ 
10783: 				value = (uint8_t) bank;
10784: 			}
10785: 			error_code = IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, definition[index].symbol, value );
10786: 			if ( SUCCESS == error_code )
10787: 			{
10788: 				printf( "WR: %s=0x%02X\n", definition[index].acronym, value );
10789: 			}
10790: 		}
10791: 	}
10792: 	else
10793: 	{
10794: 		if ( argc < 2 )
10795: 		{ 
10796: 			uint8_t value;
10797: 			error_code = IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, definition[index].symbol, &value );
10798: 			if ( SUCCESS == error_code )
10799: 			{
10800: 				printf( "RD: %s=0x%02X\n",  definition[index].acronym, value );
10801: 			}
10802: 		}
10803: 		else
10804: 		{
10805: 			uint8_t value;
10806: 			value = (uint8_t) strtol( argv[1], NULL, 0 );
10807: 			error_code = IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, definition[index].symbol, value );
10808: 			if ( SUCCESS == error_code )
10809: 			{
10810: 				printf( "WR: %s=0x%02X\n", definition[index].acronym, value );
10811: 			}
10812: 		}
10813: 	}
10814: 
10815:     return SUCCESS;
10816: }
10817: 
10818: 
10824: static int CMD__Main_IO_Behavior( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10825: { 
10826: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10827: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10828: 
10829: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10830: 	{ 
10831: 		printf( "IO Simulate        = %s\n", dataset->io_simulate ? "true" : "false" );
10832: 		printf( "IO Report          = %s\n", dataset->io_report   ? "true" : "false" );
10833: 	}
10834: 	else if ( argc > 1 )
10835: 	{ 
10836: 		if       ( 0 == strcmpi( "simulate", argv[0] ) )
10837: 		{
10838: 			dataset->io_simulate = String_To_Bool( argv[1] );
10839: 		}
10840: 		else if  ( 0 == strcmpi( "report", argv[0] ) )
10841: 		{
10842: 			dataset->io_report = String_To_Bool( argv[1] );
10843: 		}
10844: 		else
10845: 		{
10846: 
10847: 		}
10848: 		printf( "OK\n" );
10849: 	}
10850: 	else
10851: 	{ 
10852: 		if       ( 0 == strcmpi( "simulate", argv[0] ) )
10853: 		{
10854: 			printf( "IO Simulate        = %s\n", dataset->io_simulate ? "true" : "false" );
10855: 		}
10856: 		else if  ( 0 == strcmpi( "report", argv[0] ) )
10857: 		{
10858: 			printf( "IO Report          = %s\n", dataset->io_report   ? "true" : "false" );
10859: 		}
10860: 	}
10861: 	return SUCCESS;
10862: }
10863: 
10869: static int CMD__Main_Base( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10870: { 
10871: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10872: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10873: 
10874: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10875: 	{ 
10876: 		printf( "base               = 0x%04X\n", dataset->base_address );
10877: 	}
10878: 	else
10879: 	{ 
10880: 		dataset->base_address = (uint16_t) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
10881: 		printf( "OK\n" );
10882: 	}
10883: 	return SUCCESS;
10884: }
10885: 
10891: static int CMD__Main_Irq_Number( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10892: { 
10893: 	struct idi_dataset *  idi_dataset = NULL;
10894: 
10895: 	switch( board_id )
10896: 	{
10897: 		case ID_IDI48:
10898: 			idi_dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10899: 			break;
10900: 	}
10901: 
10902: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10903: 	{ 
10904: 		if ( NULL == idi_dataset ) return SUCCESS;
10905: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10906: 		printf( "irq                = %u\n", idi_dataset->irq_number );
10907: #else
10908: 		printf( "irq                = %u\n", idi_dataset->irq_number );
10909: #endif
10910: 	}
10911: 	else
10912: 	{ 
10913: 		if ( NULL == idi_dataset ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
10914: 		idi_dataset->irq_number = (unsigned int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
10915: 		printf( "OK\n" );
10916: 	}
10917: 	return SUCCESS;
10918: }
10919: 
10928: static int CMD__Main_I_Count( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10929: { 
10930: 	struct idi_dataset *  idi_dataset = NULL;
10931: 
10932: 	switch( board_id )
10933: 	{
10934: 		case ID_IDI48:
10935: 			idi_dataset = ( struct idi_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10936: 			break;
10937: 	}
10938: 
10939: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10940: 	{ 
10941: 		if ( NULL == idi_dataset ) return SUCCESS;
10942: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
10943: 		printf( "iqty               = %d\n", idi_dataset->irq_quantity );
10944: #else
10945: 		printf( "iqty               = %lu\n", idi_dataset->irq_quantity );
10946: #endif
10947: 	}
10948: 	else
10949: 	{ 
10950: 		if ( NULL == idi_dataset ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
10951: 		idi_dataset->irq_quantity = (size_t) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
10952: 		printf( "OK\n" );
10953: 	}
10954: 	return SUCCESS;
10955: }
10956: 
10957: #if (0)
10958: 
10965: static int CMD__Main_Init_Reg( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
10966: { 
10967: 	int index;
10968: 	int error_code;
10969: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
10970: 	struct reg_definition * definition;
10971: 	dataset    = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
10972: 	definition = ( struct reg_definition * ) board_definition[board_id].definition;
10973: 
10974: 	if ( argc < 1 )
10975: 	{ 
10976: 		for ( index = 0; index < REGS_INIT_QTY; index++ )
10977: 		{
10978: 			printf ( "reg_init[%2d]: ", index );
10979: 			if ( dataset->reg_init[index].used )
10980: 			{
10981: 				if ( IDI_UNDEFINED != dataset->reg_init[index].location )
10982: 				{
10983: 					row  = REG_LOCATION_LOGICAL_GET( location );
10984: 					printf( "reg = %s, value = 0x%02X", definition[row].acronym, value );
10985: 				}
10986: 				else
10987: 				{
10988: 					printf( "address  = 0x%04X, value = 0x%02X", address, value );
10989: 				}
10990: 			}
10991: 			else
10992: 			{
10993: 				printf( "unused" );
10994: 			}
10995: 		}
10996: 		printf( "\n" );
10997: 	}
10998: 	else if ( argc > 1 )
10999: 	{ 
11000: 		for ( index = 0; index < REGS_INIT_QTY; index++ )
11001: 		{
11002: 			if ( IDI_UNDEFINED != dataset->reg_init[index].location )
11003: 			{
11004: 				if ( SUCCESS == Register_Acronym_To_Row( board_id, argv[0], &index ) )
11005: 				{ 
11006: 
11007: 				}
11008: 				else
11009: 				{
11010: 
11011: 				}
11012: 			}
11013: 		}
11014: 	}
11015: 
11016: 	if ( argc > 0 )
11017: 	{
11018: 		
11019: 
11020: 	}
11021: 
11022: 	return SUCCESS;
11023: }
11024: #endif
11025: 
11031: static int CMD__Main_FRAM_CS( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
11032: { 
11033: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
11034: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
11035: 
11036: 	if ( argc < 1 )
11037: 	{ 
11038: 		printf( "framcs             = " );
11039: 		if ( true == dataset->fram_cs_default ) printf( "1" );
11040: 		else                                    printf( "0" );
11041: 		printf( "  (FRAM SPI Chip Select)\n" );
11042: 	}
11043: 	else
11044: 	{ 
11045: 		dataset->fram_cs_default = String_To_Bool( argv[0] );
11046: 		printf( "OK\n" );
11047: 	}
11048: 	return SUCCESS;
11049: }
11050: 
11056: static int CMD__Main_AnalogStick_CS( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
11057: { 
11058: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
11059: 	dataset = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
11060: 
11061: 	if ( argc < 1 )
11062: 	{ 
11063: 		printf( "aics               = " );
11064: 		if ( true == dataset->as_cs_default ) printf( "1" );
11065: 		else                                  printf( "0" );
11066: 		printf( "  (Analog Stick SPI Chip Select)\n" );
11067: 	}
11068: 	else
11069: 	{ 
11070: 		dataset->as_cs_default = String_To_Bool( argv[0] );
11071: 		printf( "OK\n" );
11072: 	}
11073: 	return SUCCESS;
11074: }
11075: 
11084: static int CMD__Main_Mode_Jumpers( int board_id, int argc, char * argv[] )
11085: { 
11086: 	struct board_dataset * ds = NULL;
11087: 
11088: 	switch( board_id )
11089: 	{
11090: 		case ID_IDI48:
11091: 			ds = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
11092: 			break;
11093: 		case ID_IDO48:
11094: 			ds = ( struct board_dataset * )  board_definition[board_id].dataset;
11095: 			break;
11096: 	}
11097: 
11098: 	if ( argc < 1 )
11099: 	{ 
11100: 		if ( NULL == ds ) return SUCCESS;
11101: 		printf( "mode               = " );
11102: 		switch( ds->mode_jumpers )
11103: 		{
11104: 			case MODE_JUMPERS_0:	printf( "0 (legacy)" );		break;
11105: 			case MODE_JUMPERS_1:	printf( "1         " );		break;
11106: 			case MODE_JUMPERS_2:	printf( "2         " );		break;
11107: 			case MODE_JUMPERS_3:	printf( "3         " );		break;
11108: 		}
11109: 		printf( ". Assumed mode jumper settings.\n" );
11110: 	}
11111: 	else
11112: 	{ 
11113: 		if ( NULL == ds ) return -EC_BOARD_TYPE;
11114: 		if ( 0 == strcmpi( "legacy", argv[0] ) )
11115: 		{
11116: 			ds->mode_jumpers = MODE_JUMPERS_0;
11117: 		}
11118: 		else
11119: 		{
11120: 			ds->mode_jumpers = (MODE_JUMPERS_ENUM) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
11121: 		}
11122: 		printf( "OK\n" );
11123: 	}
11124: 	return SUCCESS;
11125: }
11126: 
11130: static struct command_line_board  cmd_set[] =
11131: {
11132: 	{	NULL,		CMD__Main_Base,				"base",		"params: [<address>]"										},
11133: 	{	NULL,		CMD__Main_IO_Behavior,		"io",		"params: [<simulate>/<report>]"								},
11134: 	{	NULL,   	CMD__Main_Irq_Number,	    "irq",      "params: [<irq_number 0 to 15>]"                       		},
11135: 	{	NULL,   	CMD__Main_I_Count,		    "iqty",     "params: [<number>].  Number of interrupts."				},
11136: 	{	NULL,   	CMD__Main_FRAM_CS,		    "framcs",   "params: [<0/1>].  FRAM SPI chip select channel."			},
11137: 	{	NULL,   	CMD__Main_AnalogStick_CS,   "aics",   	"params: [<0/1>].  Analog Stick SPI chip select channel."	},
11138: 	{	cmd_trace,  CMD__Main_Trace,    		"trace",   	"params: [<start/stop/file>."								},
11139: 	{	NULL,  		CMD__Main_Mode_Jumpers,		"mode",   	"params: [<0/1/2/3].  Mode jumper settings"					},
11140: 	{	NULL,		NULL,						NULL,		NULL														},
11141: };
11142: 
11148: int Command_Line_Set( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11149: {
11150: 	int 		error_code;
11151: 	int 		index;
11152:     int     	argc_new;
11153:     char ** 	argv_new;
11154:     (void)		board_id;
11155: 
11156:     error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11157: 
11158: 	if ( argc < 1 )
11159: 	{
11160: 		index = 0;
11161: 		while ( NULL != cmd_set[index].cmd_fnc )
11162: 		{
11163: 			argv_new = &(argv[1]);
11164: 			argc_new = argc - 1;
11165: 			if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
11166: 			error_code = (* cmd_set[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
11167: 			index++;
11168: 		}
11169: 	}
11170: 	else
11171: 	{
11172: 		index = 0;
11173: 		while ( NULL != cmd_set[index].cmd_fnc )
11174: 		{
11175: 			if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_set[index].name, argv[0] )  )
11176: 			{
11177: 				argv_new = &(argv[1]);
11178: 				argc_new = argc - 1;
11179: 				if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
11180: 				error_code = (* cmd_set[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
11181: 				break;
11182: 			}
11183: 			index++;
11184: 		}
11185: 	}
11186: 	return error_code;
11187: }
11188: 
11194: int Command_Line_Dump( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11195: {
11196: 	int    error_code;
11197: 	FILE * fd_out;
11198: 	
11199: 	
11200: 
11201: 	if ( argc > 0 )
11202: 	{
11203: 		fd_out = fopen( argv[0], "w" );
11204: 		if ( NULL == fd_out ) fd_out = stdout;
11205: 	}
11206: 	else
11207: 	{
11208: 		fd_out = stdout;
11209: 	}
11210: 	error_code = Register_Report_CSV( board_id, fd_out );
11211: 
11212: 	if ( (argc > 0) && (NULL != fd_out) && (stdout != fd_out) )
11213: 	{
11214: 		fclose( fd_out );
11215: 	}
11216: 	return error_code;
11217: }
11218: 
11219: 
11229: int Command_Line_IO_Write( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11230: {
11231: 	size_t	index;
11232: 	BOOL	address_captured;
11233: 	int    	error_code;
11234: 	int    	address;
11235: 	uint8_t value;
11236: 	BOOL	auto_index;
11237: 	(void)	board_id;
11238: 
11239: 	if ( argc < 2 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
11240: 
11241: 	address_captured = false;
11242: 	auto_index       = true;
11243: 	for ( index = 0; index < argc; index++ )
11244: 	{
11245: 		if ( ( 'x' == argv[index][0] ) || ( 'X' == argv[index][0] ) )
11246: 		{ 
11247: 			auto_index = !auto_index;
11248: 		}
11249: 		else
11250: 		{
11251: 			if ( false == address_captured )
11252: 			{ 
11253: 				address = (int) strtol( argv[index], NULL, 0 );
11254: 				address_captured = true;
11255: 				
11256: 			}
11257: 			else
11258: 			{
11259: 				value   = (uint8_t) strtol( argv[index], NULL, 0 );
11260: 				error_code = IO_Write_U8_Port( NULL, __LINE__, address, value );
11261: 				if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
11262: 				if ( true == auto_index ) address++;
11263: 			}
11264: 		}
11265: 	}
11266: 	printf( "OK\n" );
11267: 	return error_code;
11268: }
11269: 
11279: int Command_Line_IO_Read( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11280: {
11281: 	size_t	index;
11282: 	BOOL	count_capture;
11283: 	BOOL	address_captured;
11284: 	BOOL	auto_index;
11285: 	int    	error_code;
11286: 	int    	address;
11287: 	int		count;
11288: 
11289: 	uint8_t value;
11290: 	(void)	board_id;
11291: 
11292: 	if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
11293: 
11294: 	count			 = 1;
11295: 	error_code       = SUCCESS;
11296: 	count_capture    = false;
11297: 	address_captured = false;
11298: 	auto_index       = true;
11299: 	for ( index = 0; index < argc; index++ )
11300: 	{
11301: 		if ( ( 'c' == argv[index][0] ) || ( 'C' == argv[index][0] ) )
11302: 		{ 
11303: 			count_capture = true;
11304: 		}
11305: 		else if ( ( 'x' == argv[index][0] ) || ( 'X' == argv[index][0] ) )
11306: 		{ 
11307: 			auto_index = !auto_index;
11308: 		}
11309: 		else
11310: 		{
11311: 			if ( true == count_capture )
11312: 			{ 
11313: 				count = (int) strtol( argv[index], NULL, 0 );
11314: 				count_capture = false;
11315: 			}
11316: 			else
11317: 			{
11318: 				if ( false == address_captured )
11319: 				{ 
11320: 					address = (int) strtol( argv[index], NULL, 0 );
11321: 					address_captured = true;
11322: 					printf( "0x%04X:", address );
11323: 				}
11324: 				else
11325: 				{
11326: 
11327: 
11328: 				}
11329: 			}
11330: 		}
11331: 	}
11332: 
11333: 	for ( index = 0; index < count; index++ )
11334: 	{
11335: 		error_code = IO_Read_U8_Port( NULL, __LINE__, address, &value );
11336: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) return error_code;
11337: 		printf( " 0x%02X", value );
11338: 		if ( true == auto_index ) address++;
11339: 	}
11340: 
11341: 	printf( "\n" );
11342: 	return error_code;
11343: }
11344: 
11348: int Command_Line_Wait( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11349: {
11350: 	(void)  board_id;
11351: 	(void)	argc;
11352: 	(void)  argv;
11353: 
11354: 	if ( global_loop_command ) return SUCCESS;
11355: 	global_loop_command = true;
11356: 	return SUCCESS;
11357: }
11358: 
11359: 
11364: static void Help_Pause_Helper( BOOL skip_pause, size_t * line )
11365: {
11366: 	if ( true == skip_pause ) return;
11367: 	if ( *line > 20 )
11368: 	{
11369: 		printf( "Press any key for more....." );
11370: 		while ( !Character_Get( NULL ) ) {  }
11371: 		printf( "\r" );
11372: 		*line = 0;
11373: 	}
11374: }
11375: 
11379: static void Help_Output( BOOL							skip_pause,
11380: 						 int							depth,
11381: 						 size_t *						line,
11382: 						 struct command_line_board * 	table,
11383: 						 FILE * 						out
11384: 					   )
11385: {
11386: 	size_t 		 row;
11387: 	int			 index;
11388: 	const char * prefix = { "       " };
11389: 
11390: 	row = 0;
11391: 	while ( NULL != table[row].name )
11392: 	{
11393: 		if ( 0 == depth )
11394: 		{
11395: 			fprintf( out, "%-4s", table[row].name );
11396: 		}
11397: 		else
11398: 		{
11399: 			for ( index = 0; index < depth; index++ ) fprintf( out, "%s", prefix );
11400: 			fprintf( out, "%-8s", table[row].name );
11401: 		}
11402: 		fprintf( out, " - %s\n", table[row].help );
11403: 		*line += 1;
11404: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
11405: 		Help_Pause_Helper( skip_pause, line );
11406: #endif
11407: 		if ( NULL != table[row].link )
11408: 		{ 
11409: 			Help_Output( skip_pause, depth + 1, line, table[row].link, out );
11410: 			fprintf( out, "\n" );
11411: 			*line += 1;
11412: 		}
11413: 		row++;
11414: 	}
11415: }
11416: 
11421: static void IDI_Help( size_t * line, FILE * out )
11422: {
11423: 	fprintf( out, "IDI48 board supported\n" );
11424: 	fprintf( out, " Examples:\n" );
11425: 	fprintf( out, "   idi dig0          <-- reports the digital input group 0 port.\n" );
11426: 	fprintf( out, "   idi loop dig0     <-- loops until key pressed\n" );
11427: 	fprintf( out, "   idi irq loop dig0 <-- loops while counting interrupts or until iqty reached\n" );
11428: 	fprintf( out, "   idi irq dig0      <-- does command once and uses interrupts for short time\n" );
11429: 	*line += 7;
11430: }
11431: 
11436: static void IDO_Help( size_t * line, FILE * out )
11437: {
11438: 	fprintf( out, "IDO48 board supported\n" );
11439: 	fprintf( out, " Examples:\n" );
11440: 	fprintf( out, "   ido dog0          <-- reports the digital output group 0 port.\n" );
11441: 	fprintf( out, "   ido loop dog0     <-- loops until key pressed\n" );
11442: 	*line += 5;
11443: }
11444: 
11445: 
11446: static struct command_line_board    cmd_top[];
11447: static struct command_line          cmd_prefix[];
11448: 
11449: 
11450: 
11455: static void Help( BOOL skip_pause, FILE * out )
11456: {
11457: 	size_t  line;
11458: 	int		top;
11459: 
11460: 	line = 0;
11461: 	fprintf( out, "\n" );
11462: 	fprintf( out, "STDBus General Test Code\n" );
11463: 	fprintf( out, "Apex Embedded Systems\n" );
11464: 	fprintf( out, "SVN software revision: " SVN_REV "\n"  );
11465: 	fprintf( out, "Supporting:\n" );
11466: 	line += 5;
11467: 
11468: 	IDI_Help( &line, out );
11469: 	IDO_Help( &line, out );
11470: 
11471: 	fprintf( out, "\n" );
11472: 	fprintf( out, "help - outputs help information\n" );
11473: 	line += 2;
11474: 
11475: 	top = 0;
11476: 	while ( NULL != cmd_prefix[top].name )
11477: 	{
11478: 		fprintf( out, "\n" );
11479: 		fprintf( out, "%-4s - %s\n", cmd_prefix[top].name, cmd_prefix[top].help );
11480: 		top++;
11481: 		line += 2;
11482: 		Help_Pause_Helper( skip_pause, &line );
11483: 	}
11484: 
11485: 	Help_Output( skip_pause, 0, &line, (struct command_line_board *) cmd_top , out );
11486: 	fprintf( out, "\n" );
11487: }
11488: 
11492: int Command_Line_Help( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11493: {
11494: 	FILE *  out;
11495: 	FILE *  fd = NULL;
11496: 	BOOL    skip_pause = false;
11497: 	(void)  board_id;
11498: 
11499: 	out = stdout;
11500: 	if ( argc > 0 )
11501: 	{ 
11502: 		fd = fopen( argv[0], "w" );
11503: 		if ( NULL != fd )
11504: 		{
11505: 			out = fd;	skip_pause = true;
11506: 		}
11507: 	}
11508: 	Help( skip_pause, out );
11509: 	if ( NULL != fd ) fclose( fd );
11510: 
11511: 	return SUCCESS;
11512: }
11513: 
11517: int FPGA_Date_Time_Information( int board_id, uint32_t * date_svn, uint32_t * date_compilation )
11518: {
11519: 	int 			location_data;	
11520: 	int 			location_index; 
11521: 	int				state;
11522: 	size_t			index;
11523: 	size_t  		count;
11524: 	BOOL			fpga_data_available;
11525: 	const uint8_t 	index_test_list[] = { 0x05, 0x0A, 0x00 };
11526: 	uint8_t			scratch[16] = { 0x00 };
11527: 	uint8_t			block_offset;
11528: 	uint8_t 		block_type;
11529: 	uint32_t 		scratch_u32;
11530: #define FPGA_DATE_SIZE 4
11531: 	struct board_dataset *  dataset;
11532: 	dataset = (struct board_dataset *) board_definition[board_id].dataset;
11533: 
11534: 	if ( MODE_JUMPERS_0 == dataset->mode_jumpers )
11535: 	{ 
11536: 		return -EC_MODE_LEGACY;
11537: 	}
11538: 
11539: 	
11540: 	location_data  		= board_definition[board_id].fpga_data_symbol;
11541: 	location_index 		= board_definition[board_id].fpga_index_symbol;
11542: 	fpga_data_available = true; 
11543: 	
11544: 	count 				= 0;
11545: 	while ( 0x00 != index_test_list[count] )
11546: 	{
11547: 		IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, index_test_list[count] );
11548: 		IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, &(scratch[count]) );
11549: 		count++;
11550: 	}
11551: 	for ( index = 0; index < count; index++ )
11552: 	{
11553: 		if ( index_test_list[index] != scratch[index] )
11554: 		{
11555: 			fpga_data_available = false;
11556: 			break;
11557: 		}
11558: 	}
11559: 
11560: 	if ( false == fpga_data_available )
11561: 	{ 
11562: 		*date_svn = 0;
11563: 		*date_compilation = 0;
11564: 		return SUCCESS;
11565: 	}
11566: 
11567: 	state        = 0;
11568: 	index        = 0;
11569: 	block_offset = 0;
11570: 	while( 3 != state )
11571: 	{
11572: 		switch ( state )
11573: 		{
11574: 			case 0:	
11575: 				IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, (uint8_t) index );
11576: 				index++;
11577: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_data, &block_offset    );
11578: 
11579: 				IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, (uint8_t) index 	);
11580: 				index++;
11581: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_data, &block_type 		);
11582: 
11583: 				switch( block_type )
11584: 				{
11585: 					case 's':
11586: 					case 'S':  
11587: 						state = 1;		count = 0;
11588: 						break;
11589: 					case 'c':
11590: 					case 'C':	
11591: 						state = 2;		count = 0;
11592: 						break;
11593: 					case 0x00:
11594: 					case 0xFF:	
11595: 						state = 3;
11596: 						count = 0;
11597: 						break;
11598: 					default:
11599: 						break;
11600: 				}
11601: 				break;
11602: 			case 1: 
11603: 				IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, (uint8_t) index   );
11604: 				index++;	count++;
11605: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id,  __LINE__, location_data,  &(scratch[FPGA_DATE_SIZE - count]) );
11606: 				if ( FPGA_DATE_SIZE == count )
11607: 				{
11608: 					size_t i;
11609: 					scratch_u32 = 0;
11610: 					for ( i = 0; i < FPGA_DATE_SIZE; i++ )
11611: 					{
11612: 						scratch_u32 = ( scratch_u32 << 8 ) + ( (uint32_t) scratch[i] );
11613: 					}
11614: 					*date_svn = scratch_u32;
11615: 					state = 0;
11616: 				}
11617: 				break;
11618: 			case 2: 
11619: 				IO_Write_U8( board_id, __LINE__, location_index, (uint8_t) index   );
11620: 				index++;	count++;
11621: 				IO_Read_U8( board_id,  __LINE__, location_data,  &(scratch[FPGA_DATE_SIZE - count]) );
11622: 				if ( FPGA_DATE_SIZE == count )
11623: 				{
11624: 					size_t i;
11625: 					scratch_u32 = 0;
11626: 					for ( i = 0; i < FPGA_DATE_SIZE; i++ )
11627: 					{
11628: 						scratch_u32 = ( scratch_u32 << 8 ) + ( (uint32_t) scratch[i] );
11629: 					}
11630: 					*date_compilation = scratch_u32;
11631: 					state = 0;
11632: 				}
11633: 				break;
11634: 		} 
11635: 	} 
11636: 	return SUCCESS;
11637: #undef FPGA_DATE_SIZE
11638: }
11639: 
11640: 
11658: 
11659: 
11660: 
11661: 
11665: int Command_Line_FPGA( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11666: {
11667: 	int			error_code;
11668: 	FILE *		out;
11669: 	uint32_t 	date_svn;
11670: 	uint32_t 	date_compilation;
11671: 	(void)		argc;
11672: 	(void)		argv;
11673: 
11674: 	error_code = FPGA_Date_Time_Information( board_id, &date_svn, &date_compilation );
11675: 	if ( error_code < SUCCESS ) goto Command_Line_FPGA_Exit;
11676: 
11677: 	out = stdout;
11678: 
11679: 	fprintf( out, "FPGA: " );
11680: 
11681: 	if ( 0 == date_svn )
11682: 	{
11683: 		fprintf( out, "SVN = unavailable" );
11684: 	}
11685: 	else
11686: 	{
11687: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
11688: 		fprintf( out, "SVN =    %08lu", date_svn );
11689: #else
11690: 		fprintf( out, "SVN =    %08u", date_svn );
11691: #endif
11692: 	}
11693: 
11694: 	if ( 0 == date_compilation )
11695: 	{
11696: 		fprintf( out, ", Compilation = unavailable\n" );
11697: 	}
11698: 	else
11699: 	{
11700: #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
11701: 		fprintf( out, ", Compilation = %08lu\n", date_compilation );
11702: #else
11703: 		fprintf( out, ", Compilation = %08u\n", date_compilation );
11704: #endif
11705: 	}
11706: 
11707: Command_Line_FPGA_Exit:
11708: 	return error_code;
11709: }
11710: 
11716: #define CMD_MAIN_LIST(_) \
11717: 	 \
11718: 	_( NULL,		Command_Line_Dump,				"dump",		"Register information in CSV format",		true	) \
11719: 	_( cmd_set,		Command_Line_Set,				"set",		"Set/Get main parameters",					true	) \
11720: 	_( cmd_spi,		Command_Line_SPI,				"spi",		"SPI related functions",					true	) \
11721: 	_( cmd_as,		Command_Line_Analog_Stick,		"as",		"Analog Stick related functions",			true	) \
11722:  	_( cmd_fram,	Command_Line_FRAM,				"fram",		"FRAM related functions",					true	) \
11723:  	_( cmd_idi48,	Command_Line_IDI48,				"di",		"Digital input related functions",			false 	) \
11724:  	_( cmd_ido48,	Command_Line_IDO48,				"do",		"Digital output related functions",			false 	) \
11725:  	_( NULL,		Command_Line_IO_Write,			"o",		"unrestricted I/O write <address> <data>",	false	) \
11726:  	_( NULL,		Command_Line_IO_Read,			"i",		"unrestricted I/O read  <address>",			false	) \
11727: 	_( NULL,		Command_Line_Wait,				"wait",		"wait for any key press",					false	) \
11728: 	_( NULL,		Command_Line_Help,				"help",		"very brief command summary",				false	) \
11729: 	_( NULL,		Command_Line_FPGA,				"fpga",		"fpga compilation and svn dates",			false	) \
11730:  	_( NULL,		NULL,							NULL,		NULL,										false	)
11731: 
11732: #define CMD_MAIN_EXTRACT_COMMANDS(link,fnc,name,help,brdrqrd)  				{ link, fnc, name, help },
11733: #define CMD_MAIN_EXTRACT_BOARD_TYPE_REQUIRED(link,fnc,name,help,brdrqrd)	brdrqrd,
11734: 
11735: 
11739: static struct command_line_board  cmd_top[] =
11740: {
11741: 	CMD_MAIN_LIST( CMD_MAIN_EXTRACT_COMMANDS )
11742: };
11743: static BOOL cmd_top__board_type_required[] =
11744: {
11745: 		CMD_MAIN_LIST( CMD_MAIN_EXTRACT_BOARD_TYPE_REQUIRED )
11746: };
11747: 
11759: int Command_Line_Main( int board_id, int argc, char* argv[] )
11760: {
11761: 	int 	error_code;
11762: 	int     index;
11763: 	BOOL	not_found;
11764:     int     argc_new;
11765:     char ** argv_new;
11766: 
11767: 
11768:     error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11769: 
11770:     if ( argc < 1 ) return -EC_NOT_FOUND;
11771: 
11772:     
11773: 	not_found = true;
11774: 	index     = 0;
11775: 	while ( NULL != cmd_top[index].cmd_fnc )
11776: 	{
11777: 		if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_top[index].name, argv[0] )  )
11778: 		{
11779: 			not_found = false;
11780: 			argv_new = &(argv[1]);
11781: 			argc_new = argc - 1;
11782: 			if ( 0 == argc_new ) argv_new = NULL;
11783: 			error_code = (* cmd_top[index].cmd_fnc )( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
11784: 			if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto COMMAND_LINE_MAIN_TERMINATE;
11785: 			break;
11786: 		}
11787: 		index++;
11788: 	}
11789: 
11790: 	if ( not_found )
11791: 	{ 
11792: 		argv_new = &(argv[0]);
11793: 		argc_new = argc - 0;
11794: 		error_code = Command_Line_Register_Transaction( board_id, argc_new, argv_new );
11795: 		if ( SUCCESS != error_code ) goto COMMAND_LINE_MAIN_TERMINATE;
11796: 	}
11797: COMMAND_LINE_MAIN_TERMINATE:
11798: 	return error_code;
11799: }
11800: 
11805: enum CLM_BTS   
11806: {
11807: 	CLM_BTS_NORMAL  		= 0,
11808: 	CLM_BTS_NOT_REQUIRED	= 1,
11809: 	CLM_BTS_IMPLIED			= 2
11810: };
11811: 
11812: 
11822: static enum CLM_BTS Command_Line_Main__Board_Type_Status( const char * cmd_string, int * board_id )
11823: {
11824: 	int    	 		index;
11825: 	enum CLM_BTS	status;
11826: 	index     = 0;
11827: 	status    = CLM_BTS_NORMAL;
11828: 	*board_id = ID_BOARD_UNKNOWN;
11829: 	while ( NULL != cmd_top[index].cmd_fnc )
11830: 	{   
11837: 
11838: 		
11839: 		if      ( 0 == strcmpi( "do", cmd_string )  )
11840: 		{
11841: 			*board_id = ID_IDO48;	status = CLM_BTS_IMPLIED;
11842: 		}
11843: 		else if ( 0 == strcmpi( "di", cmd_string )  )
11844: 		{
11845: 			*board_id = ID_IDI48;	status = CLM_BTS_IMPLIED;
11846: 		}
11847: 
11848: 
11849: 		
11850: 		if ( 0 == strcmpi( cmd_top[index].name, cmd_string )  )
11851: 		{
11852: 			if ( false == cmd_top__board_type_required[index] )
11853: 			{
11854: 				if ( CLM_BTS_NORMAL == status ) status = CLM_BTS_NOT_REQUIRED;
11855: 			}
11856: 			return status;
11857: 		}
11858: 		index++;
11859: 	}
11860: 	return status;
11861: }
11862: 
11866: static int Command_Line_Loop_Count( int   argc,    
11867: 									char* argv[]   
11868: 							      )
11869: {
11870: 	int error_code;
11871: 
11872: 	if ( argc > 0 )
11873: 	{
11874: 		if ( argv[0][0] >= '0' && argv[0][0] <= '9' )
11875: 		{
11876: 			global_loop_count         = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
11877: 			global_loop_count_counter = global_loop_count;
11878: 			error_code = 1;
11879: 		}
11880: 		else
11881: 		{
11882: 			error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11883: 		}
11884: 	}
11885: 	else
11886: 	{
11887: 		error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11888: 	}
11889: 	return error_code;
11890: }
11891: 
11895: static int Command_Line_Loop_Delay( int   argc,    
11896: 									char* argv[] 
11897: 							      )
11898: {
11899: 	int error_code;
11900: 
11901: 	if ( argc > 0 )
11902: 	{
11903: 		if ( argv[0][0] >= '0' && argv[0][0] <= '9' )
11904: 		{
11905: 			global_loop_delay_ms = (int) strtol( argv[0], NULL, 0 );
11906: 			error_code = 1;
11907: 		}
11908: 		else
11909: 		{
11910: 			error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11911: 		}
11912: 	}
11913: 	else
11914: 	{
11915: 		error_code = -EC_SYNTAX;
11916: 	}
11917: 	return error_code;
11918: }
11919: 
11923: static int Command_Line_Loop_Space( int   argc,    
11924: 									char* argv[]   
11925: 							      )
11926: {
